S06adsp55-u:113_2: aśramaṇo bhavaty aśākyaputrīyaḥ so 'bhavyas tenaiva ātmabhāvena caturṇāṃ śrāmaṇyaphalānām
S06adsp55-u:113_3: anyatarānyatarañc chrāmaṇyaphalam anuprāptum. evam eva subhūte gurutaro 'yaṃ cittotpādo
S06adsp55-u:113_4: yo nāmāpadeśena bodhisattvasya manyanāsahagataś cittotpāda utpannas,
S06adsp55-u:114: tena ca nāmadheya mātreṇa anyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vimaṃsyate avamaṃsyate atimaṃsyate ayan tena gurutaraś cittotpādo veditavyaḥ. (AdSPG I 12)
S06adsp55-u:115_0: iti hi subhūte imāni nāmavyapadeśena utpatsyante mārakarmāṇi sūkṣmāṇi. tiṣṭhantu
S06adsp55-u:115_1: subhūte catasro gurukā mūlāpattayaḥ. pañcabhyaḥ ānantaryebhyo gurutaro 'yaṃ cittotpādaḥ
S06adsp55-u:115_2: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya nāmāpadeśena manyanāsahagataś cittotpāda utpannaḥ. ayan tena
S06adsp55-u:115_3: gurutaraś cittotpādo veditavyaḥ. punar aparaṃ subhūte vivekaguṇāpadeśena bodhisattvaṃ
S06adsp55-u:115_4: mahāsattvaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyaty upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06adsp55-u:117: ] varṇavādī na ca ahaṃ subhūte evaṃ vivekaṃ vadāmi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yaduta āraṇyāni vanaprasthāni prāntāni śayyāsanāni. āha:
S06adsp55-u:118: kaḥ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyo viveko yadi na āraṇyāni vanaprasthāni prāntāni śayyāsanāni kīdṛgrūpaḥ sa bhagavann anyo viveko bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya?
S06adsp55-u:120_0: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto bhavati śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair
S06adsp55-u:120_1: manasikārair vivikto bhavati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ āraṇyeṣu vanaprastheṣu prānteṣu
S06adsp55-u:120_2: śayyāsaneṣu viharati vivikta eva viharati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. ayaṃ subhūte viveko
S06adsp55-u:120_3: mayā anujñāto bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anena ced vivekena rātriṃ divaṃ ca viharati
S06adsp55-u:121: mahāsattvaḥ yaś ca mayā subhūte viveko 'nujñāto bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ,
S06adsp55-u:122_0: yaṃ ca punar enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān vivekam upadekṣaty āraṇyeṣu vanaprastheṣu prānteṣu
S06adsp55-u:122_1: śayyāsaneṣu viharet sa tena vivekena saṃkīrṇa eva san śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktair
S06adsp55-u:122_2: manasikārair avirahita prajñāpāramitā anabhisaṃyukto sarvākārajñatāṃ na paripūrayiṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:122_3: evaṃ so 'nena vihāreṇa viharan na pariśuddhamanasikāra eva saṃs tadanyān bodhisattvān
S06adsp55-u:122_4: mahāsattvān atimaṃsyate. ye grāmānte viharanti. pariśuddhacitta manasikārāḥ śrāvakacittena
S06adsp55-u:122_5: asaṃkīrṇāḥ pratyekabuddhacittena asaṃkīrṇās tadanyair vā pāpakaiś cittotpādair asaṃkīrṇāḥ
S06adsp55-u:122_6: dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnām abhijñāparijñāparipūriṃ gatāḥ. atha ca punaḥ so
S06adsp55-u:123_0: tatra madhyagataḥ vā saṃkalpayati varṣaṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ
S06adsp55-u:123_1: vā varṣakoṭīṃ vā varṣakoṭīśataṃ vā varṣakoṭīsahasraṃ va varṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā
S06adsp55-u:123_2: varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā tato vottari imañ ca vivekaṃ na jānīyād yena vivekena
S06adsp55-u:125: saṃkliṣṭha eva tatra viveke niśrita ālīno 'dhyavasito 'idhyavasitavān,
S06adsp55-u:126: na me sa tāvatā cittam abhirādhayati. yaś ca mayā viveka ākhyāto bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tena vivekena samanvāgatas tasminn api sa viveke na saṃdṛśyate. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:127: tathā hi sa virahitas tena vivekena. tam enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramya uparyantarīkṣe sthitvaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06adsp55-u:128_0: sādhu sādhu kulaputra eṣa sa bhūto vivekas tathāgatena ākhyātaḥ etena tvaṃ vivekena
S06adsp55-u:128_1: vihara. evaṃ tvaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. sa tato vivekāt
S06adsp55-u:128_2: taṃ vivekaṃ pradhānatamaṃ mānyamānaḥ punar api grāmāntam avatīrya tadanyān bodhisattvayānikān
S06adsp55-u:128_3: bhikṣūn pariśuddhacittamanasikārān yāvat peśalān kalyāṇadharmāṇo 'vamaṃsyate. saṃkīrṇavihāreṇeme
S06adsp55-u:129: ye te viviktaṃ vihariṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvās [f. 218b] tān saṃkīrṇavihariṇaś codayiṣyaty ākīrṇavihariṇaś codayiṣyaty atimaṃsyate. ye ca te saṃkīrṇavihariṇo vihariṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:131: tatra ca gauravam utpādayiṣyati. yatra ca gauravam utpādayitavyaṃ tatra mānam utpādayiṣyati. tat kasya heto?
S06adsp55-u:133: aham amanuṣyaiś codye aham amanuṣyaiḥ smārye.
S06adsp55-u:135: eṣa subhūte vihāro yena vihāreṇa ahaṃ viharāmi. ko grāmāntavihariṇaś codayiṣyati. ko grāmāntavihāriṇaḥ smārayiṣyati?
S06adsp55-u:136_0: evaṃ sa bodhisattvo bodhisattvayānikān kulaputrān atimaṃsyate. ayaṃ subhūte pudgalo
S06adsp55-u:136_1: bodhisattvaś caṇḍālo veditavyo bodhisattvadūṣī veditavyo bodhisattvaprativarṇiko
S06adsp55-u:136_2: veditavyaḥ cauraḥ sadevamānuṣāsure loke cauro veditavyaḥ. sa ca punaḥ bodhisattvayānikaiḥ
S06adsp55-u:136_3: kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā tādṛgjātīyaḥ pudgalo na sevitavyo na bhakṣitavyo na
S06adsp55-u:137: ādhimānikā hi subhūte te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyaḥ. yasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparityaktā sarvākārajñatā aparityaktā ca anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhis,
S06adsp55-u:138: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena,
S06adsp55-u:139_0: sarvasattvānām arthaṃ kartukāmena tādṛgjātīyāḥ pudgalā na sevitavyā na bhajitavyā
S06adsp55-u:139_1: na paryupāsitavyāḥ. api tu khalu svārthayogam anuyuktena bhavitavyam. nityam udvignamānasena.
S06adsp55-u:139_2: saṃsārād uttrastamānasena. asaṃsṛṣṭena traidhātuke. tatraiva ca bodhisattvacaṇḍālaiḥ
S06adsp55-u:139_3: maitry utpādayitavyā tatraiva anukampām upādāya kāruṇyatā utpādayitavyā. muditopekṣotpādayitavyā.
S06adsp55-u:140: tathā kariṣyāmi yathaite mama doṣāḥ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:142: kṣipram etāṃ prahāsyāmi iti śikṣā karaṇīyā. ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām svayamabhijñāparākramo veditavyaḥ. punar aparaṃ subhute (AdSPG I 16)
S06adsp55-u:143: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhajitavyāni paryupāsitavyāni. āha:
S06adsp55-u:144: kāni punar bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni?
S06adsp55-u:146: buddhā bhagavantaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06adsp55-u:147: bodhisattvā api subhūte mahāsattvā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06adsp55-u:148: śrāvakā api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06adsp55-u:149: ye ca ṣaṭpāramitān ākhyāyanti deśayanti prakāśayanti. [f. 219a] prasthāpayanti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkurvanti saṃprakāśayanti,
S06adsp55-u:150: ime 'pi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni. punar aparaṃ subhūte ṣaṭpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06adsp55-u:151: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06adsp55-u:152: tathatā bhūtakoṭir dharmadhātur bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni. punar aparaṃ subhūte ṣaṭpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śāstāro veditavyāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:154: ṣaṭpāramitā ālokaḥ. ṣaṭpāramitā ulkā avabhāso buddhir medhā prajñā,
S06adsp55-u:158: ṣaṭpāramitā mātā. catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāvat sarvākārajñatā sarvavāsanānusandhi prahāṇāya saṃvartate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:159: tathā hi subhūte ye 'pi te 'bhūvann (AdSPG I 17)
S06adsp55-u:161_0: teṣāṃ api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ima eva bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ mātāpitarau bhūvan. ye
S06adsp55-u:161_1: 'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās teṣām
S06adsp55-u:161_2: api subhūte buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ima eva bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ mātāpitarau bhaviṣyanti.
S06adsp55-u:161_3: ye 'pi te subhūte etarhi daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante
S06adsp55-u:162: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ima eva bodhipakṣyā dharmā mātāpitarau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:163: tathā hi subhūte ato niiyātā atītānāgata pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena,
S06adsp55-u:166: caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ sattvāḥ saṃgṛhītavyāḥ. katamaiś caturbhir?
S06adsp55-u:167: yaduta dānena priyavacane na arthacaryayā samānārthatayā. imam apy ahaṃ subhūte arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyann evaṃ vadāmi:
S06adsp55-u:169: layanaṃ trāṇaṃ dvīpaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ yaduteṣā eva bodhipakṣyā dharmā. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena aparapraṇeyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena,
S06adsp55-u:172: sattvāṃś ca paripācayitukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:173: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ te dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam. subhūtir āha:
S06adsp55-u:177: subhūte prajñāparamitā. na subhūte prajñāpāramitā [f. 219b] lakṣaṇaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:179: syād bhagavaṃ paryāyo yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tena lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyeran?
S06adsp55-u:181: evam etat subhūte evam etat yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tenaiva lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:182: sarvadharmā hi subhūte viviktasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāḥ. anena subhūte paryāyeṇa yena lakṣaṇeṇa prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate,
S06adsp55-u:183: tena lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyante. yaduta śūnyatālakṣaṇena viviktalakṣaṇena. āha:
S06adsp55-u:184: yadi bhagavaṃ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmair viviktāḥ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyās,
S06adsp55-u:185: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānaṃ prajñāyate. na hi bhagavaṃ viviktam saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate,
S06adsp55-u:186: na sūnyatā saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate. na viviktaṃ na?
S06adsp55-u:187_0: śūnyatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. na viviktena śūnyatāyāṃ kaścid
S06adsp55-u:187_1: dharma upalabhyate. na viviktena śūnyatāyāṃ sattva upalabhyate yo bodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta
S06adsp55-u:187_2: asya bhagavaṃ vayaṃ bhāṣitasya katham arthan ājānīyāma?
S06adsp55-u:189: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte dīrgharātraṃ sattvā ahaṃkāramamakāre caranti?
S06adsp55-u:190: āha: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugataḥ. dīrgharatraṃ sattvā ahaṃkāramamakāre caranti. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:191: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv ahaṃkāramamakārau viviktau śūnyau?
S06adsp55-u:192: aha: śūnyau bhagavaṃc chūnyau sugataḥ. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:193: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv ahaṃkāramamakāreṇa sattvāḥ saṃsaranti saṃdhāvanti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:194: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugataḥ. ahaṃkāramamakāreṇa sattvāḥ saṃdhāvanti saṃsaranti. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:196: yatra na ahaṃkāro na mamakāraḥ tatra nodgrāhaḥ, (AdSPG I 19)
S06adsp55-u:197: nodgrahaḥ na tatra sattvāḥ sandhāvanti na saṃsaranti,
S06adsp55-u:198: na tatra saṃkleśaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvānāṃ vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate. āha:
S06adsp55-u:199: evaṃ caraṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carali,
S06adsp55-u:200: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne carati. na caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati yāvan na aṣṭādaśeṣv āveṇikeṣu buddharmeṣu carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:201_0: tathā hi te dharmā nopalabhyante yaś cared yata vā cared yatra vā cared. evaṃ caraṃ
S06adsp55-u:201_1: bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo anavamardanīyo bhavati. sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena.
S06adsp55-u:201_2: evaṃ caraṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair na
S06adsp55-u:202: tathā hi so 'nabhibhūtasthāne sthito yaduta bodhisattvanyāme,
S06adsp55-u:203: anabhibhūto hi bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvākārajñātāmanasikāreṇa avirahita evaṃ caraṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvākārajñatayā abhyāśī bhavati. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:204: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte [f. 220a] yāvatyo jāṃbudvīpakā sattvās te sarve mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheran,
S06adsp55-u:205: mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeran,
S06adsp55-u:206: tān ca kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā. yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhanto satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet,
S06adsp55-u:207: tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06adsp55-u:208: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaved?
S06adsp55-u:209: ahā: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:211_0: vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved yaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ pareṣām
S06adsp55-u:211_1: ācakṣīta deśayet prakāśayet prasthāpayed vivared vibhajed uttānikuryāt saṃprakāśayet
S06adsp55-u:212: evaṃ yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāṃs te sarve mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheraṃs,
S06adsp55-u:213: tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06adsp55-u:214: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣu apramāṇeṣu catasriṣv ārūpyasamāpattīṣu yāvat srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgamīphale anāgāmīphale arhattve pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed,
S06adsp55-u:215: anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet tāñ ca kuśalamūlān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayet,
S06adsp55-u:216: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet?
S06adsp55-u:217: āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:218: ataḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved, ya
S06adsp55-u:219: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pareṣām ācakṣīta deśayet prakāśayet prasthāpayed vivared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś ca manasikārair viharet,
S06adsp55-u:220: sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:221: tathā hi na kasyacit sattvasya tādṛśo vihāro yādṛśo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06adsp55-u:222: sthāpayitvā tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:223: tathā hi te kulaputrā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto mahāmaitrīm abhinirharanti,
S06adsp55-u:226: te tena vihāreṇa viharaṃto muditayā pramodanto 'bhipramodanti. te (AdSPG I 21)
S06adsp55-u:227_0: mahāmuditām abhinirharanti. te tena nimittena sārdhaṃ na saṃvasanti. te mahopekṣāṃ
S06adsp55-u:227_1: pratilabhante. ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvanāṃ mahāṃ prajñāloko yaduta
S06adsp55-u:227_3: prajñāpāramitālokaḥ. anabhisaṃbuddhā api te kulaputrāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchanti,
S06adsp55-u:228_0: na ca vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. yasya ca te paribhuñjate cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān
S06adsp55-u:229: sarvākārajñatāyāś ca abhyāsī bhavanti. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena amoghaṃ rāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ paribhoktukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ mārgam upadeśayitukāmena,
S06adsp55-u:233_0: prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair satatasamitaṃ vihartavyam. sacet subhūte
S06adsp55-u:233_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tair prajñāpāramitāpratisamuyktair manasikārair viharet tena
S06adsp55-u:233_2: prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktā eva kathā kathitavyā. tena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān
S06adsp55-u:233_3: eva kathān kathitvā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair eva manasikārair vihartavyaṃ. tena
S06adsp55-u:233_4: prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktamanasikāreṇa viharatā anyeṣāṃ manasikārāṇām avakāśo na dātavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:234: tathā ca kartavyaṃ yathā tair eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair rātriṃ divam anikṣiptadhuro (AdSPG I 22)
S06adsp55-u:235_0: viharet. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kenacid eva puruṣeṇa maṇiratnam apratilabdhapūrvaṃ
S06adsp55-u:235_1: bhavet. so yena samayena pratilabheta tan maṇiratnaṃ pratilabhya udāreṇa prītiprāmodyasaumanasyena
S06adsp55-u:235_2: samanvāgato bhavet. tasya sahapratilambham eva tan maṇiratnaṃ punaḥ praṇaśyet sa
S06adsp55-u:235_3: tatonidānaṃ mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena saṃyukto bhavet. sa?
S06adsp55-u:236: tasya satatasamitaṃ ratnapratisaṃyuktā eva manasikārāḥ pravarterann:
S06adsp55-u:237_0: aho vatāhaṃ tena manoramena maṇiratnena visaṃyukta iti. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:237_1: mahāsattvena ratnam idam iti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahitena
S06adsp55-u:237_2: bhavitavyam. na ca tat sarvākārajñatāratna nāmitavyam eva satataṃ sukhasaumanasya
S06adsp55-u:238: yat punar bhagavaṃ sarvamanasikārā svabhāvena virahitāḥ sarvamanasikārāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā,
S06adsp55-u:239: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahito bhavati?
S06adsp55-u:241: na manasikāro na sarvākārajñatā. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:242: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jānāti:
S06adsp55-u:243_0: virahitāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena. te na śrāvākaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair kṛtā
S06adsp55-u:243_1: na ca buddhair bhagavadbhir kṛtā sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā
S06adsp55-u:243_2: dharmaniyāmatā tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmadhātur bhūtakoṭiḥ. avirahito
S06adsp55-u:243_3: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo prajñāpāramitāyā bhavati. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:244: [f. 221a] eṣā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena viviktā,
S06adsp55-u:246: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate. āha:
S06adsp55-u:247: saced bhagavan prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena viviktā svabhāvena śūnyā,
S06adsp55-u:248: kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudagamya (AdSPG I 23)
S06adsp55-u:251: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgamya vivardhate vā parihīyate vā,
S06adsp55-u:252: na bhūtakoṭir vivardhate vā parihīyate vā,
S06adsp55-u:253: na dharmadhātur vivardhate vā parihīyate vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:254: na hi prajñāpāramitā ekaṃ na dve,
S06adsp55-u:255: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe cittaṃ na avalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati na santrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06adsp55-u:256: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyās sthito 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avaivartyadhātau. caraty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. subhūtir āha:
S06adsp55-u:257: kiṃ punar bhagavan yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā riktatā vaśikatā asārakatā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06adsp55-u:260: tato 'nyatra bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06adsp55-u:263: kaccit punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06adsp55-u:266: kaccit punar bhagavaṃc chūnyatā śūnyatāyāṃ carati?
S06adsp55-u:269: kaccit punar bhagavan anyatra śūnyatāyāḥ śūnyatāyāṃ carati?
S06adsp55-u:272: kiṃ punar bhagavan rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06adsp55-u:275: kiṃ punar bhagavan ṣaṭpāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06adsp55-u:284_0: kiṃ punar bhagavan yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatāriktatātucchatā-asārakatātathatā-avitathatā-ananyatathatā
S06adsp55-u:284_1: dharmatā dharmadhātu dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06adsp55-u:287: sacet punar bhagavann ete dharmā na caranti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06adsp55-u:288: tat kathaṃ punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ?
S06adsp55-u:290: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [f. 221b] carati?
S06adsp55-u:291: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:292: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvam tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yatra bodhisattvena caritavyam?
S06adsp55-u:293: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:294: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yad dharma yaṃ tvaṃ na samanupaśyasi. kaścit sa dharma upalabhyate?
S06adsp55-u:295: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:296: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmo nopalabhyate api nu sa dharma utpatsyate vā nirotsyate vā?
S06adsp55-u:297: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:298_0: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ. evaṃrūpayā
S06adsp55-u:298_1: subhūte kṣāntyā samanvāgato. bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛyate buddhair bhagavadbhir
S06adsp55-u:298_2: anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. iyam ucyate subhūte daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvin mahāmaitryā
S06adsp55-u:298_3: mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā pratisaṃvider tāṃ. yāṃ pratipadyamāno bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:298_4: mahāsattva. evaṃ caran evaṃ ghaṭamāṇaḥ (AdSPG I 25)
S06adsp55-u:299: evaṃ vyāyacchamāno anuttarasamyaksaṃbuddhajñānaṃ mahājñānaṃ sarvākārajñatājñānaṃ nānuprāpsyatīti. nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:300: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā. tasya na kadācit teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hānir bhaviṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:301: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. subhūtir āha:
S06adsp55-u:302: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām utpādāya vyākṛyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06adsp55-u:305: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām anutpattikatāya vyākṛyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06adsp55-u:308: tat kiṃ bhagavan naivotpattito nānutpattito vyākṛyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06adsp55-u:311: sacet punar bhagavan naivotpattito nānutpattito bodhisattvo vyākṛyate 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06adsp55-u:312: tat katham idānīṃ vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06adsp55-u:314: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ tad dharmaṃ yo vyākṛyate 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksambodhau?
S06adsp55-u:315_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. na nahan tad dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo vyākṛyate 'nuttarasyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:315_1: samyaksaṃbodhau. tam apy ahaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo 'bhisaṃbudhyate
S06adsp55-u:315_2: yena vā dharmeṇa abhisaṃbudhyate. .... tā. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:316: evam etat subhūte evam etat. sarvadharmān anupalaṃbhamānasya (AdSPG I 26)
S06adsp55-u:317: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavaty. aham abhisaṃbhotsye. anena abhisaṃbhotsyate idam abhisaṃbhotsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:318: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarva ete vikalpā na saṃvidyante. tat [f. 222a] kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:322: atha śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:323_0: gaṃbhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā dudṛśyā duranubodhā atarkyā atarkā avacarā yāvat
S06adsp55-u:323_1: sūkṣmā nipuṇā paṇḍitavijñāvedanīyā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā atyantiviviktatām upādāya.
S06adsp55-u:323_2: na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:324_0: ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
S06adsp55-u:324_1: tathātvāya ca pratipatsyante na ca anyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dāsyanti
S06adsp55-u:324_2: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsjante. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:325_0: evam etat kauśika evam etat. na te sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti
S06adsp55-u:325_1: ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti dhārayisyanti vācayiṣyanti. tathātvāya
S06adsp55-u:325_2: ca pratipatsyante na ca anyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dāsyanti. yāvad
S06adsp55-u:325_3: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. tat kiṃ manyase kauśika ye ca yāvantyo
S06adsp55-u:325_4: jāṃbudvīpakā sattvās te sarve daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgatā bhaveyuś
S06adsp55-u:325_5: caturbhir dhyānaiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ paṃcabhir abhijñābhiḥ,
S06adsp55-u:326_0: yaś ca kaluputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed
S06adsp55-u:326_1: vācayet paryavāpnuyāt udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya tathātvāya pratipadyeta. (AdSPG I 28)
S06adsp55-u:327: asya kauśika kuśalamūlasya etat paurvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06adsp55-u:328_0: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api. kotitamīm api yāvat koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīm
S06adsp55-u:328_1: api kalāṃ nopaiti. saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate. atha
S06adsp55-u:328_2: anyataro bhikṣu. śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:331: abhibhūtā kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā te sarvajāṃcaturdhyānasamanvāgatāś (sic)
S06adsp55-u:332_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām avikṣiptena cittena udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
S06adsp55-u:332_2: paryavāpsyati tathātvāyā ca pratipatsyate. na cānyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dāsyati,
S06adsp55-u:333: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. evam ukte śakro devānām indras taṃ bhikṣum etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:334_0: ekacittotpādena bhikṣos tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena te sarvajāṃbudvīpakā sattvā
S06adsp55-u:334_2: caturārūpyasamāpattisamanvāgatāḥ paṃcābhijñāsamanvāgatā abhibhūtāḥ. kaḥ punar vādo
S06adsp55-u:334_3: ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati [f. 222b] paryavāpsyati
S06adsp55-u:334_4: udgṛhyā dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya tathātvāya pratipatsyate. tena sadevamānuṣāsuro
S06adsp55-u:334_5: loko abhibhūto bhaviṣyati sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati. na kevalaṃ
S06adsp55-u:334_6: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattva mahāsattvo. ye 'pi te srotaāpannāḥ
S06adsp55-u:335: 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhās tān api sarvān abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. na kevalaṃ srotaāpannā yāvat pratyekabuddhā,
S06adsp55-u:336_0: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃty upāyakauśalavirahitā prajñāpāramitāvirahitās
S06adsp55-u:336_1: tān api sarvān abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. na kevalaṃ ye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06adsp55-u:337_0: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranty upāyakauśalavirahitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitās
S06adsp55-u:337_1: tān apy abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattva. na kevalaṃ ye kṣānti pāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06adsp55-u:338_0: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranty upāyakauśalavirahitās prajñāpāramitayā
S06adsp55-u:338_1: virahitās tān apy abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattva. na kevalaṃ ye vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06adsp55-u:339_0: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranty upāyakauśalavirahitāḥ
S06adsp55-u:339_1: prajñāpāramitāvirahitās tān apy abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ. ye
S06adsp55-u:339_2: te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06adsp55-u:340: te sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena na śakyam abhibhavitum. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yaś carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathopadiṣṭāṃ prajñāpāramitām anuvartate,
S06adsp55-u:342_0: mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñātāvaṃśasya anupacchedāya sthitaḥ. ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvas
S06adsp55-u:342_1: tathāgatān na dūrīkaroti. ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ pratipadyamāno na virāgayati
S06adsp55-u:342_2: bodhimaṇḍam. ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān saṃsīdān uddhartukāmaḥ. ayaṃ bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:342_3: mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ na śrāvakaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate. na pratyekabuddhaśikṣāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:343: śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya catvāro maharājāno upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte,
S06adsp55-u:345_0: śīghraṃ bho mahāpuruṣa śikṣasva laghu śikṣasva imāni tāni catvāri pātrāṇi yāni tvayā
S06adsp55-u:345_1: parigṛhītavyāni bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇe 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya yāni parigrahītāni
S06adsp55-u:345_2: paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhai. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ
S06adsp55-u:345_3: prajñāparamitāyām upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante catvāro mahārājakāyikāḥ devarājā. sārdhaṃ
S06adsp55-u:345_4: mahārājakāyikair devaputrai punar trāyastriṃśa devaputrā apy enam upsaṃkramitavyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:345_5: maṃsyaṃte. sārdhaṃ trāyastriṃśair devaputraiḥ suyāmo 'pi devarājā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte,
S06adsp55-u:346: sārdhaṃ yāmair devaputrai saṃtuṣito 'pi devarājā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte,
S06adsp55-u:347: sārdhaṃ tuṣitair devaputraiḥ nirmito 'pi devarājā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte. sārdhaṃ nirmāṇāratibhir devaputraiḥ vaśavarty api devarājā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06adsp55-u:348_0: sārdhaṃ vaśavartibhir devaputraiḥ brahmāpi sahaṃpatir upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate.
S06adsp55-u:348_1: sārdhaṃ brahmakāyikair devaputraiḥ ābhāsvarā api devā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte.
S06adsp55-u:348_2: śubhakṛtsnāḥ bṛhatphalāḥ avṛhāḥ atapāḥ [f. 223a] sudṛśāḥ sudarśanāḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā
S06adsp55-u:348_3: devā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante. yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:349_0: tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nityaṃ samanvāhṛto
S06adsp55-u:349_1: bhaviṣyati ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati. evaṃ carato bodhisattvasya
S06adsp55-u:349_2: mahāsattvasya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yāni kānicil laukikāni duḥkhāni paropakramāṇi (AdSPG I 31)
S06adsp55-u:350_0: kāye utpatsyante tāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ kāye notpatsyante. na nipatiṣyanti. ime bhikṣor
S06adsp55-u:350_1: dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇā bhaviṣyanti tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:350_2: carataḥ. tasmin samaye yāni tāni sannipātikāni glānyāni,
S06adsp55-u:351_0: tadyathā cakṣurogaḥ śrotrarogaḥ jihvārogo dantaśūlaṃ kāyaśūlaṃ cittaśūlaṃ yāvat tāni
S06adsp55-u:351_1: sarvāṇi kāye notpatsyante na nipatiṣyanti. ime bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dṛṣṭadhārmikā
S06adsp55-u:351_2: guṇāḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyā iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ. athāyuṣmataḥ ānandasyaitad abhūt:
S06adsp55-u:352: kim ayaṃ śakro devānām indra ātmīyena svakena pratibhānena prajñāpāramitām upadiśati. prajñāpāramitāyāś ca guṇānuśaṃsāna utāho buddha anubhāvena?
S06adsp55-u:353: atha śakro devānām indra āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasyaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:354: buddha anubhāva eṣa bhadanta ānanda veditavyo yo 'haṃ prajñāpāramitām upadiśāmi. prajñāpāramitāyaś ca guṇānuśaṃsāṃ. atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:356_0: tathāgatasyaiṣo 'nubhāva tathāgatasyaitad adhiṣṭhānam. yac chakro devānām indraḥ
S06adsp55-u:356_1: prajñāpāramitām upadiśati. asyāś ca prajñāpāramitāyā guṇānuśaṃsān. yasmin khalu punar
S06adsp55-u:356_2: samaye ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:357: tasmiṃ samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃs te sarve saṃśayaprāptā bhavaṃti:
S06adsp55-u:358: kim ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūtakotiṃ sākṣātkṛtya śrotaāpattiphalam anuprāpsyati (AdSPG I 32)
S06adsp55-u:361_0: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyā avirahito
S06adsp55-u:361_1: bhavati tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃc chokaśalyaviddho bhavati. punar aparam ānanda
S06adsp55-u:361_2: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān ulkapātān avasṛjati. bhayaṃ janayaty apy
S06adsp55-u:361_3: eva nāma bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avalīnatā bhavet romaharṣo vā bhaved avalīnacittatā
S06adsp55-u:361_4: vā bhaved ekacittavikṣepo vā bhavet sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāt. athāyuṣmān ānando
S06adsp55-u:362: kina punar bhagavan sarvān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ?
S06adsp55-u:364: na khalv ānanda sarvāṃ bodhisattvāṃ mahāsattvān māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ. ānanda āha:
S06adsp55-u:367_0: yeṣām ānanda bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pūrvāntataḥ iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:367_1: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ cittaṃ nādhimuktaṃ tāṃ māra pāpīyān upasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:367_2: punar aparam ānanda ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvā
S06adsp55-u:367_3: saṃśayaprāptā 'bhūvan syād veyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na vā syād iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06adsp55-u:368: etān ānanda māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ. punar (AdSPG I 33)
S06adsp55-u:369: aparam ānanda bodhisattvaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahito bhavati. so 'paśyaṃ kalyāṇamitram imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na śṛṇoti. aśṛṇvan na jānāti,
S06adsp55-u:370_0: ajānaṃ na tathātvāyā pratipadyate. kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyeti. punar aparam
S06adsp55-u:370_1: ānanda bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahitaḥ asaddharmaparigrāhaṃ karoty asyāpy
S06adsp55-u:370_2: ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avakāśaṃ labhate. punar aparam
S06adsp55-u:370_3: ānanda prajñāpāramitayā virahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ asaddharmasya varṇāṃ bhāṣate,
S06adsp55-u:372: sahāyako 'yaṃ mama yo asaddharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06adsp55-u:373: bahūnām apy eṣa bodhisatttvayānikānāṃ sahāyako labdho yo 'saddharmasya varṇāṃ bhāṣate. ayaṃ mama abhiprāyaṃ paripūrayiṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:374: yat te bodhisattvayānikā dvayor bhūmyo sthāsyanti. yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabūmau vā. punar aparam ānanda kiyadrūpasya bodhisattvasya māro 'vatāraṃ labhate?
S06adsp55-u:375: yo bodhisattva iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamaṇāyām evaṃ vadati:
S06adsp55-u:376: gaṃbhīreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kin te 'nayā gaṃbhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā śrutayā bhāṣitayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā?
S06adsp55-u:377: aham eva tāvad gādhaṃ nopalabhe. kutas tvaṃ lapsyase?
S06adsp55-u:378: asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpiyān avatāraṃ labhate. punar aparam ānanda yasmiṃ samaye bodhisattvo 'nyatarān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamanyate:
S06adsp55-u:379: ahaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carāmi yāvad ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmi na tvaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carasi yāvan na tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carasi, asyāpy (AdSPG I 34)
S06adsp55-u:380_0: ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ lapsyate. punar aparam ānanda yasmiṃ
S06adsp55-u:380_1: samaye bodhisattva ātmānam utkṛṣṭaṃ manyate tasminn ānanda samaye māraḥ pāpīyān tuṣṭo
S06adsp55-u:380_2: bhavaty udagra āttamanaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati tasyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya
S06adsp55-u:380_3: māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ labhate. punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvasya
S06adsp55-u:380_4: mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ vā gotragrahaṇaṃ vā parikīrtitaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:381_0: sa tena nāmagrahanena vā gotragrahaṇena vā tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān
S06adsp55-u:381_1: yāvat kalyāṇadharmāṇo 'bhimanyate. ātmānam utkarṣayati. paraṃ paṃsayati. te cāsya
S06adsp55-u:382_0: yāny avaivartikānāṃ bodhisattvanāṃ mahāsattvānām ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni. sa tair
S06adsp55-u:382_1: ākāraliṅganimittair asaṃvidyamānai kleśam utpādayaty ātmānaṃ cotkarṣayati paraṃś
S06adsp55-u:383: na tvam atra bodhisattvayāne sandṛśyase na bodhisattvagotre sandṛśyase,
S06adsp55-u:385: sa tena tāṃ bodhisattvayānikān pudgalāṃ kutsayati paṃsayati. tatra mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhavaty:
S06adsp55-u:386_0: aśūnyaṃ me bhavanaṃ bhaviṣyaty utsadā bhaviṣyanti mahānarakās tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ
S06adsp55-u:386_1: [f. 224a] pretaviṣayaś ca. tathā tathā ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃs taṃ bodhisattvam adhiṣṭhāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:386_2: yathā ādeyavacano bhaviṣyati. tasya tayā ādeyavacanatayā bahujanaḥ śrotavyaṃ śraddhatavyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:386_3: maṃsyante. tasya te śrutvā dṛṣṭānugītam āpatsyante. te dṛṣṭānugītam āpadyamānās tathātvāya (AdSPG I 35)
S06adsp55-u:388: te tathātvāya śikṣamāṇās tathātvāya pratipadyamānāḥ kleśaṃ vardhayiṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:389_0: evaṃ te viparyastayā santatyā yad yad eva karma ārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā
S06adsp55-u:389_1: vā sarvaṃ tad aniṣṭhatvāya akāntatvāya amana āpatvāya saṃvartiṣyate. evaṃ te mahānarakā
S06adsp55-u:389_2: utsadā bhaviṣyanti tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ pretaviṣaya utsado bhaviṣyati. mārabhavanam
S06adsp55-u:389_3: utsado bhaviṣyati. imam ānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān āttamanā bhaviṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:390: pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ. punar aparam ānanda saced bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ śrāvakayānikena kulaputreṇa sārdhaṃ vivadati ahaṃ pradhānataro na tvaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:392: dūrīkariṣyati vatāyaṃ kulaputraḥ sarvākārajñātām. na sa abhyāśi bhaviṣyati sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:393_0: naite kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādā sarvākārajñatāyā mārgaḥ narakamārga eṣa tiryagyonimārga
S06adsp55-u:393_1: eṣa yamalokamārga eṣa naiṣa mārgaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. punar aparam ānanda saced bodhisattvayānikaḥ
S06adsp55-u:394: sārdhaṃ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādaṃ karoti tatra mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:395: ubhāv etau dūrīkarisyatas sarvākārajñatām. ubhāv etau nābhisaṃbhotsyete 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:397: mārgaḥ naiṣa pratipat sarvākārajñatāyā ya ābhyāṃ kulaputrābhyām ārabdhaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:398_0: narakatiryagyoniyamalokamārga eṣa ya ābhyāṃ kulaputrābhyām ārabdhaḥ. punar aparam
S06adsp55-u:398_1: ānanda saced avyākṛto bodhisattvo vyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya antike cittam āghātayet
S06adsp55-u:399_0: tena punar eva tāvata eva kalpān samnāhaḥ sannaddhavyaḥ yāvanto 'sya te cittotpādāḥ
S06adsp55-u:399_1: pāpakā utpannāḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādān kurvataḥ. saced asya sarvākārajñatā
S06adsp55-u:400: asti punar bhagavann eṣāṃ cittotpādānāṃ niḥsaraṇatā utāho tāvata eva kalpāṃs tena saṃnāhaḥ sannaddhavyaḥ?
S06adsp55-u:402_0: sanniḥsaraṇo mayā ānanda dharmo deśitaḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:402_1: bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānām. tatra ānanda yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo
S06adsp55-u:402_2: bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahet vā vivadeta vā ākrośed vā paribhāṣeta
S06adsp55-u:402_3: vā kalahitvā vivadya ākruṣya paribhāṣya na pratideśayed anuśayaṃ vahed anubaddho 'nuśayena viharen,
S06adsp55-u:403: na aham ānanda tasya pudgalasya niḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmi,
S06adsp55-u:404: avaśyam eva tena pudgalena tāvata eva kalpāṃ sannāha sannaddhavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:405_0: saced asya aparityaktā bhavati sarvākārajñatā. yaḥ punar ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:405_1: kalahitvā vivadya ākruśya paribhāṣya pratideśayati. nānuśayaṃ vahaty āyatyāṃ saṃvaram āpadyate,
S06adsp55-u:406_0: durlabdhā me lābhā yan mayā sarvasattvānāṃ duḥkham apahartavyaṃ tad ahaṃ mantrite
S06adsp55-u:406_1: pratimantrayāmi. yan mayā sarvasattvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyam. so 'haṃ parasya
S06adsp55-u:407: vadāmi prativacanaṃ dadāmi. evam api me na kartavyam. jaḍaiḍamūkasadṛśena me bhavitavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:409_0: yat mayaite sattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya
S06adsp55-u:409_1: tad aham atraiva vyāpadye tad aham atraiva kṣubhyāmi na mayātra vyāpattavyaṃ na mayātra
S06adsp55-u:409_2: kṣubhitavyam. asya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sanniḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmi,
S06adsp55-u:410_0: asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ na labhate. punar aparam
S06adsp55-u:410_1: ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śrāvakayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃsargo na kartavyam.
S06adsp55-u:410_2: sacet tiṣṭhante na kasyacid antike vyāpattavyaṃ na kṣubhitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:411: tathā hi naitan mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad aham eṣām antike vyāpadyeyaṃ vā kṣubhyeyaṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:412: tathā hy ete mayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimocayitavyāḥ. ānanda āha:
S06adsp55-u:413: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām antike sthātavyam?
S06adsp55-u:415: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda śāstuḥ. evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvayānikasya pudgalasya antike sthātavyam. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:416: eṣa me sahāyaka ekanau samārūḍho yathaivānena śikṣitavyaṃ tathaiva me śikṣitavyaṃ. yatraiva anena śikṣitavyaṃ. tatraiva mayā śikṣitavyaṃ. dānapāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG I 38)
S06adsp55-u:417_0: yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. evaṃ ca tena cittam utpādayitavyaṃ. saṃbodhimārgadeśaka
S06adsp55-u:417_1: eṣa me. sacet punar eṣa vyavakīrṇe vihared apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair
S06adsp55-u:417_2: na mayātra śikṣitavyaṃ. sacet punar eṣa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avirahito viharet
S06adsp55-u:417_3: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair mayā 'py evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. evaṃ śikṣamāṇo
S06adsp55-u:421: katamā bhagavaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā yatra samatāyāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:425_0: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā. yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
S06adsp55-u:425_1: subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā. rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā
S06adsp55-u:425_2: vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ yāvad bodhir bodhyā śūnyā,
S06adsp55-u:426: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā yatra samatāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. āha:
S06adsp55-u:427: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yad rūpasya kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ,
S06adsp55-u:428_0: yad rūpasya virāgāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. yad rūpasya nirodhāya śikṣate
S06adsp55-u:428_1: śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. yad rūpasya anutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:428_2: yāvad yad bodheḥ kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. evaṃ yāvad bodher virāgāya
S06adsp55-u:428_3: nirodhāya anutpādāya [f. 225a] śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñātāyāṃ. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:430_0: yad rūpasya kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. yāvad yad rūpasya anutpādāya
S06adsp55-u:430_1: śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. yāvad yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya
S06adsp55-u:430_2: kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. yāvad yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ
S06adsp55-u:432_0: yāvad yad bodheḥ kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. evaṃ yad bodher virāgāya
S06adsp55-u:432_1: nirodhāya anutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. vistareṇa kartavyaṃ. tat
S06adsp55-u:432_2: kiṃ manyase subhūte yā rūpasya tathatā yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya tathatā,
S06adsp55-u:433: yāvad yā bodhes tathatā yāvad yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgataḥ prajñapyate. api nu sā tathatā kṣīyate vā nirudhyate vā prahīyate vā?
S06adsp55-u:434: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ no hīdaṃ sugata. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:435_0: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathatāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:435_1: na tathatā kṣīyate vā nirudhyate vā prahīyate vā. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:435_2: mahāsattvaḥ tathatāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte
S06adsp55-u:435_3: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣate. yāvāc caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu,
S06adsp55-u:436_0: yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. evaṃ
S06adsp55-u:436_1: śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitām anuprāpnoti. evaṃ
S06adsp55-u:436_2: śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śakyate mārair vā mārakāyikābhir vā
S06adsp55-u:436_3: devatābhir dharṣayitum. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva kṣipram eva
S06adsp55-u:436_4: avaivartyabhūmim anuprāpnoti. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svake
S06adsp55-u:437_0: carati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāthakaraṇeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣate.
S06adsp55-u:437_1: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāmaitryāṃ śikṣate. mahākaruṇāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:437_2: śikṣate. buddhakṣetrapariśodhanāya śikṣate. sattvaparipākāya śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
S06adsp55-u:437_4: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmi iti
S06adsp55-u:437_5: śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgatavaṃśasya anupacchedāya
S06adsp55-u:437_6: śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ amṛtasya dvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣate,
S06adsp55-u:438_0: asaṃskṛtadhātuṃ sandarśayiṣyāmīti śikṣate. na subhūte śakyaṃ hīnasattvair ihodāraśikṣāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:438_1: śikṣituṃ. sarvasattvān saṃsārād uddhartukāmaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ya iha śikṣāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:438_2: śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na narakeṣu upapadyate. na
S06adsp55-u:438_3: tiryagyonau na yamaloke na pratyaṃtimeṣu janapadeṣu upapadyate na pukkasacaṇḍālakuleṣu
S06adsp55-u:438_4: upapadyate. na kāṇo bhavati. na kubjo bhavati. na laṃgo bhavati. nonāṇgo bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:438_5: na badhiro bhavati. na paṅkapatito bhavati. na vikalendriyo bhavati. paripūrṇendriyo bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:439: na aparipūrṇendriyaḥ. na prāṇātipātiko bhavati. nādattādāyī [f. 225b] na kāmamithyācāriko (AdSPG I 42)
S06adsp55-u:440: na mṛṣāvādī na paiśuniko na pāruṣikaḥ na saṃbhinnapralāpī na abhidhyālur na vyāpannacitto na mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:442: saṃkalpayati. na abhūta parigrāhako bhavati na duḥśīlaparigrāhako bhavati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣu upapadyate. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:443: asty asyopāyakauśalaṃ yenopāyakauśalasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣu upapadyate. tat punaḥ katamad?
S06adsp55-u:444: yaduta ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyām upāyakauśalam upadiṣṭaṃ. yena upāyakauśalena samanvāgato dhyānāni samāpadyate. apramāṇāni samāpadyate. ārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate,
S06adsp55-u:445_0: na dhyānānām apramāṇānām ārūpyāsamāpattīnāṃ ca vaśena upapadyate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
S06adsp55-u:445_1: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvabuddhadharmabalapariśuddhim adhigacchati. yaduta
S06adsp55-u:447: tat katamasya dharmasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhim adhigacchati?
S06adsp55-u:449: evam etat subhāte evam etat tathā yathā vadasi. sarvadharmāḥ subhūte prakṛtipariśuddhāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:450: evaṃ pariśuddheṣu subhūte sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yā cittasya asaṃsīdanatā,
S06adsp55-u:452: iyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā. tat sarvabālapṛthagjanā etāṃ dharmatāṃ na jānanti na paśyanti, teṣāṃ (AdSPG I 43)
S06adsp55-u:453_0: sattvānāṃ kṛte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:453_1: caranti yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caranti. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ
S06adsp55-u:453_2: sarvadharmabalavaiśāradyatāṃ pratilabhate na ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau patati
S06adsp55-u:453_3: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvacittacaritavispanditānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:453_4: pāraṃ gacchati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakās te mahāpṛthivīpradeśā yatra jāṃbūnadaṃ
S06adsp55-u:453_5: survarṇaṃ jātarūpam utpadyate. evam eva subhūte alpakās te sattvā ya iha śikṣāyāṃ śikṣante,
S06adsp55-u:454_0: yaduta prajñāpāramitāśikṣāyāṃ. ato bahutarāḥ te sattvāḥ ye śrāvakabhūmaye vā pratyekabuddhabhūmaye
S06adsp55-u:454_1: vā saṃpratiṣṭhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakās te sattvā ye cakravartirājasaṃvartanīyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:454_2: karma samādāya vartante. ato bahutarās te sattvāḥ ye koṭṭarājasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma
S06adsp55-u:454_3: samādāya vartante. evam eva subhūte alpakās te sattvā ye imaṃ sarvajñatāmārgaṃ samārohanti.
S06adsp55-u:454_4: ato bahutarāḥ sattvāḥ ye śrāvākapratyekabuddhamārgaṃ samārohanti. ye 'pi te subhūte
S06adsp55-u:455: ato 'lpatarakās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye tathātvāya pratipadyante,
S06adsp55-u:456: ato bahutarā ye śrāvakatvāya vā pratyekabuddhatvāya vā tiṣṭhanti. ye 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ viharantaḥ niḥsaṃśayena (AdSPG I 44)
S06adsp55-u:457_0: avaivartikabhūmim ākrāmanti. ataḥ prabhūtatarā ye na avaivartikabhūmim avakrāmanti.
S06adsp55-u:457_1: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena [f. 226a] avaivartikabhūmim aimprāptukāmena
S06adsp55-u:457_2: avaivartikabhūmau gaṇanāṃ dāntukāmenehaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. punar aparaṃ
S06adsp55-u:457_3: subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata na mātsaryasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate,
S06adsp55-u:459_0: na kṣobhasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. na kausīdyasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. na vikṣepasahagataṃ
S06adsp55-u:459_1: cittam utpadyate. na dauṣprajñasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. na rāgasahagataṃ cittam
S06adsp55-u:459_2: utpadyate. na dveṣasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. na mohasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:459_3: na khilasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. na rūpasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate,
S06adsp55-u:460: na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. yāvan na bodhisahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:461_0: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na
S06adsp55-u:461_1: kaṃcid dharmam upalabhate. anupalabhamāno na kvacid dharme cittam utpādayati. evaṃ
S06adsp55-u:461_2: khalu subhūte iha gaṃbhīrāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06adsp55-u:461_3: sarvaṣaṭpāramitāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti sarvaṣaṭpāramitāḥ samudānitā bhavanti sarvaṣaṭpāramitāḥ
S06adsp55-u:462: tathā hi subhūte iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām 6arvapāramitā antargatā bhavanti. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte satkāyadṛṣṭau dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭigatāny antargatāni bhavanti. (AdSPG I 45)
S06adsp55-u:463_0: evam eva subhūte iha gaṃbhirāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvapāramitā antargatā bhavanti.
S06adsp55-u:463_1: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya kālagatasya jīvitendriye niruddhe sarvendriyāṇi
S06adsp55-u:463_2: niruddhāni bhavanti. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaiha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:464_0: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvapāramitā antargatā bhavanti. tasmāt tarhi subhūte
S06adsp55-u:464_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvapāramitānāṃ pāraṃgantukāmena iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:464_2: śikṣitavyaṃ. iha punaḥ subhūte gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:464_3: mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānām agryatāyāṃ śikṣate. tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre
S06adsp55-u:464_4: lokadhātau sattvāḥ api nu te bahavaḥ?
S06adsp55-u:465: āha: bahavo bhagavaṃ bahavaḥ sugata. jāmbūdvīpakā eva tāvad bhagavaṃ sattvā bahavaḥ kaḥ punar vādo ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:466_0: yāvantaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve anupūrvacaramaṃ
S06adsp55-u:466_1: mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeraṃs. teṣāṃ
S06adsp55-u:466_2: sarveṣām ekaikaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhan taṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair upattiṣṭhet,
S06adsp55-u:467: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasucīta?
S06adsp55-u:468: āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. bhagavān [f. 226b] āha:
S06adsp55-u:469: ataḥ sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati (AdSPG I 46)
S06adsp55-u:470: ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. tathātvāya ca pratipatsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:471_0: evaṃ mahārthikā hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā. anuttarasyāḥ
S06adsp55-u:471_1: samyaksaṃbodher āhartrī. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānām
S06adsp55-u:471_2: anuttareṇa. bhavitukāmena sarvasattvānām anāthānāṃ nāthena bhavitukāmena. aśaraṇānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:471_3: śaraṇena bhavitukāmena. aparāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇena bhavitukāmena. andhānāṃ cakṣuṣā bhavitukāmena
S06adsp55-u:471_4: avidyāndhakāraprakṣiptānāṃ dīpena bhavitukāmena. buddhatvam anuprāptukāmena buddhaviṣayam
S06adsp55-u:471_5: anugantukāmena buddhavikrīḍitaṃ vikrīḍitukāmena. buddhasiṃhanādaṃ naditukāmena buddhabherīṃ
S06adsp55-u:471_6: parāhantukāmena buddhaśaṃkhaṃ pravātukāmena buddhasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena ihaiva gaṃbhirāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:472: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na sā kācit saṃpattir yāṃ na pratilabhate. yā anena na pratilabdhavyā. subhūtir āha:
S06adsp55-u:478_0: tatra ca na sthātavyaṃ na pratiṣṭhātavyaṃ. jñānena ca darśanena ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā atikramitavyā.
S06adsp55-u:478_1: bodhisattvanyāmo 'vakramitavyaḥ. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:479_0: abhyāśī bhavaty anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte
S06adsp55-u:479_1: bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsure loke dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
S06adsp55-u:479_2: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ye tadanye dakṣiṇīyāḥ. śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tān
S06adsp55-u:479_3: sarvān abhibhūya gacchati. sarvākārajñatāyāś ca abhyāśī bhavaty. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
S06adsp55-u:479_4: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati prajñāpāramitāṃ carati ca prajñāpāramitāyām
S06adsp55-u:479_5: avirahitaś ca prajñāpāramitāyā. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:480: dūrīkaroti śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī abhyāśī bhavaty anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati. iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06adsp55-u:483: saced evaṃ jānāti na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. atha tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na jānāti. iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā iha prajñāpāramitā,
S06adsp55-u:484_0: tam api na jānāti na paśyati. yasya prajñāpāramitā yena vā prajñāpāramitā yo vā prajñāpāramitayā
S06adsp55-u:484_1: [f. 227a] niryāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:486: na anayā prajñāpāramitayā kaścid dharmo niryāti sthitatvād dharmadhātos tathatāyā bhūtakoṭeḥ. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. ((57))
S06adsp55-u:489: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūc:
S06adsp55-u:490_0: carann api iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ śilapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:490_1: vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
S06adsp55-u:490_2: sarvasattvān abhibhavati. kaḥ punar vādo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya.
S06adsp55-u:490_3: sulabdhāḥ taiḥ sattvail lābhāḥ sujīvitāṃ ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ jīvitaṃ yeṣāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:490_4: cittaṃ krāmati. kaḥ punar vādo ye 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayanti.
S06adsp55-u:490_5: spṛhaṇīyās te sattvā yair anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpāditam utpādayiṣyanti
S06adsp55-u:490_6: imāṃ ca prajnāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvantaḥ. atha śakro devānām indro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā
S06adsp55-u:490_7: yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya tair māndāravaiḥ puṣpais tathāgatam arhantaṃ
S06adsp55-u:490_8: samyaksaṃbuddham avakiranti sma abhyavakiranti sma abhiprakiranti sma. avakīrya abhyavakīrya
S06adsp55-u:491: ye bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim adhyālambante,
S06adsp55-u:492: teṣām anena kuśalamūlena buddhadharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavatu sarvākārajñatādharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavatu. esām eva svayaṃbhūdharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavatu,
S06adsp55-u:493: eṣām eva anāsravadharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavatu. na hi me bhagavann ekacittotpādo 'py utpadyate. yad bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'nuttarasyai (AdSPG I 49)
S06adsp55-u:494_0: samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthito vivarteta. na me bhagavann ekacittotpādo 'py utpadyate
S06adsp55-u:494_1: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivartya śrāvakatve vā pratyekabodhau vā patet. api tu
S06adsp55-u:494_2: khalu janayec chandam anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. bhūyasyā mātrayā praṇidhiṃ kuryād
S06adsp55-u:494_3: anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. imāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni dṛṣṭvā arthakāmo hitakāmaḥ
S06adsp55-u:494_4: sukhakāmo yogakṣemakāmaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyaibhiś cittotpādaiḥ samanvāgato
S06adsp55-u:494_5: bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vicunuyāt. kim iti vayaṃ tīrṇā atīrṇān sattvāṃs tārayema,
S06adsp55-u:495: kim iti vayaṃ muktā amuktān sattvān mocayema. kim iti vayam āśvāstā anāśvāstān sattvān āśvāsayema,
S06adsp55-u:496_0: [f. 227b] kim iti vayaṃ parinirvṛtā aparinirvṛtān sattvān parinirvāpayema. kiyat
S06adsp55-u:496_1: sa bhagavaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasaved. yaḥ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:496_2: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta. ciracaritānām api bodhisattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:496_3: mahāsattvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta avaivartikānām api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:496_4: tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta ekajātipratibaddhānām api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:497: evam ukte bhagavāṃc chakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:498: syāt kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgrapramāṇena parimāṇāṃ,
S06adsp55-u:499_0: na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃś cittotpādānāṃ puṇyasya pramāṇaṃ. syāt kauśika
S06adsp55-u:499_1: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau palāgrapramāṇena parimāṇāṃ. na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ (AdSPG I 50)
S06adsp55-u:500_0: cittotpādānāṃ puṇyasya pramāṇaṃ. syāt punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
S06adsp55-u:500_1: mahāsamudreṣu yaḥ apskandhas tasya apskandhasya śatadhābhinnayā bālāgrakoṭyā udakabindūnām
S06adsp55-u:500_2: utkṣipyamāṇānāṃ pramāṇaṃ. na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ puṇyasya
S06adsp55-u:500_3: pramāṇaṃ. evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:501: mārādhiṣṭhitā bhagavaṃs te sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃś cittotpādān na anumodiṣyante,
S06adsp55-u:502: mārapakṣikā bhagavaṃs te sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃś cittotpādān na anumodiṣyante,
S06adsp55-u:503: mārabhavanād bhagavaṃs te sattvāś cyutā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃś cittotpādān na anumodiṣyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:504_0: mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanakarā hi bhagavaṃs te sattvā ya imāṃś cittotpādān abhinirhṛtya
S06adsp55-u:504_1: anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayanti. anumoditavyās te cittotpādā ye 'nuttarasyai
S06adsp55-u:504_2: samyaksaṃbodhaye cittotpādā utpāditā. yeṣām aparityakto buddhaḥ aparityakto dharmaḥ
S06adsp55-u:506: anumodya anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāḥ. yathā na dvayasaṃjñā na advayasaṃjñā. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:507: evam etat kauśika evam etat. tathā yathā vadasi. ya imān kauśika cittotpādān anumodiṣyante,
S06adsp55-u:508: te kṣipram eva tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:509: ārāgya na virāgayiṣyanti. evaṃ te ebhir anumodanāsahagataiś cittotpādakuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgatā yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra satkṛtā bhaviṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:511: na ca te jātv amanaāpaṃ rūpaṃ drakṣyanti. na amanaāpāñc chabdāṃc chroṣyanti.
S06adsp55-u:512: (AdSPG I 51) na amanaāpān gandhān ghrāsyanti na amanaāpān rasān āsvādayiṣyanti na amanaāpān sparśān sprakṣyanti. na amanaāpān dharmān vijñāsyanti,
S06adsp55-u:513: na ca te jātu buddhair bhagavadbhir virahitā bhaviṣyanti. buddhakṣetrād [f. 228a] buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyanti. tāṃś ca buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsiṣyante,
S06adsp55-u:514: kuśalamūlān ca avaropayiṣyanti. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:515_0: tathā hi kauśika taiḥ kulaputraiś ca kuladuhitṛbhiś ca asaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:515_2: tṛtīyabhūmisthitānāṃ yāvad daśamībhūmīsthitānāṃ yāvad ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:515_3: mahāsattvānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny anumoditāni. taiś ca kuśalamūlair vivardhamānair
S06adsp55-u:515_4: anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher abhyāśībhavanti. te 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
S06adsp55-u:515_5: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyanti. tad anena api kauśika paryāyeṇa
S06adsp55-u:515_6: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:515_7: kuśalamūlāny anumodya anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni yathā na cittaṃ
S06adsp55-u:515_8: na anyatra cittena. cārikāṃ caratām avaivartikānām ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny
S06adsp55-u:515_9: anumodya anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni yathā na cittaṃ na anyatra
S06adsp55-u:515_10: cittena. athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad (AdSPG I 52)
S06adsp55-u:516: avocat: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ māyopamaṃ cittam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
S06adsp55-u:518: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ tan māyopamaṃ cittaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:519: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan na ahaṃ bhagavan māyāṃ na māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyāmi. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:520: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte. yatra na māyā na māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyasi tvaṃ tac cittaṃ yac cittam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06adsp55-u:521: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:522: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyatra māyāyā māyopamād vā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi. yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
S06adsp55-u:523_0: āha: no hīdāṃ bhagavaṃ na ahaṃ bhagavann anyatra māyāyā nānyatra māyopamāc cittāt
S06adsp55-u:523_1: tad dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi. yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:524: kataman dharmam upadekṣyāmy astitā vā nāstitā vā veti?
S06adsp55-u:525: yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so 'stitāṃ vā nāstitāṃ vopaiti. yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06adsp55-u:526: na ca asaṃvidyamāno dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:527: tathā hi bhagavaṃ sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante. ye saṃkliśyeran vā vyavadāyeran vā. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:528_0: tathā hi bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā atyantatayā viviktā dhyānapāramitā atyantatayā viviktā
S06adsp55-u:528_1: vīryapāramitā atyantatayā viviktā kṣāntipāramitā atyantatayā viviktā śīlapāramitā
S06adsp55-u:529_0: atyantatayā viviktā yāvad bodhir atyantatayā vivikta. yaś ca atyantatayā vivikto
S06adsp55-u:529_1: dharmo [f. 228b] na sa bhāvayitavyo na vibhāvayitavyaḥ. nāpi sā kasyacid dharmasya
S06adsp55-u:529_2: āhartrī prajñāpāramitā atyantaviśuddhatvāt. atyantaviviktā prajñāpāramitā. kathaṃ
S06adsp55-u:529_3: prajñāpāramitām āgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06adsp55-u:531: tat kathaṃ viviktena viviktasya anubodho bhavati?
S06adsp55-u:533_0: sādhu sādhu subhūte evam etat subhūte evam etat. atyantaviviktā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā.
S06adsp55-u:533_1: atyantavivktā hi dhyānapāramitā atyantaviviktā hi vīryapāramitā atyantaviviktā hi
S06adsp55-u:533_2: kṣāntipāramitā atyantaviviktā hi śīlapāramitā atyantaviviktā hi dānapāramitā atyantaviviktā
S06adsp55-u:533_3: hi yāvad bodhiḥ atyantaviviktā hi yāvat sarvākārajñatā. yathā subhūte atyantaviviktā
S06adsp55-u:533_4: prajñāpāramitā. yāvat sarvākārajñatā tathā atyantaviviktā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
S06adsp55-u:533_5: abhisaṃbudhyate. sacet subhūte prajñāpāramitā na atyantaviviktā syād yāvat sarvākārajñatā
S06adsp55-u:533_6: na atyantaviviktā syāt na sā syāt prajñāpāramitā yāvan na sā syāt sarvākārajñatā,
S06adsp55-u:534_0: tasmāt tarhi subhūte yathā prajñāpāramitā atyantaviviktā yathā yāvat sarvākārajñatā
S06adsp55-u:534_1: atyantaviviktā. evaṃ hi subhūte na prajñāpāramitām anāgamya anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
S06adsp55-u:534_2: abhisaṃbudhyate. na ca vivekena viveko 'bhisaṃbudhyate. abhisaṃbudhyate ca anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06adsp55-u:535: na ca anāgamya prajñāpāramitām abhisaṃbudhyate. āha:
S06adsp55-u:536: gaṃbhīre bhagavann arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:538: gaṃbhīre subhūte arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. duṣkarakārakaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo (AdSPG I 54)
S06adsp55-u:540: ca arthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti. yaduta śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:541: yathā ahaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasya artham ājānāmi. na kiṃcid duṣkaraṃ karoti. kathaṃ duṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
S06adsp55-u:543: tathā hi bhagavaṃ so 'rtho nopalabhyate. yaḥ sākṣātkṛyeta,
S06adsp55-u:545_0: so 'pi dharmo nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkuryāt. anupalabhyamāneṣu bhagavaṃ sarvadharmeṣu
S06adsp55-u:545_1: katamo 'rthaḥ sākṣātkariṣyati. katamayā vā prajñāpāramitayā sākṣātkariṣyate. katamo
S06adsp55-u:545_2: vā dharmaḥ sākṣātkariṣyate. yaṃ sākṣātkṛtya nottrasyati. na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam
S06adsp55-u:545_3: āpadya bhagavann anupalaṃbhacarir bodhisattvacarir yatra caraṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:545_4: sarvadharmeṣv anandhakāratām anuprāpnoti. saced bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvasya
S06adsp55-u:545_5: mahāsattvasya. cittaṃ na avalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati. na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam
S06adsp55-u:545_6: āpadyate. evaṃ caraṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. sa
S06adsp55-u:545_7: carāmi iti na samanupaśyati. prajñāpāramitām api na samanupasyati. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06adsp55-u:545_8: abhisaṃbhotsya ity api na samanupaśyati. tasya khalu punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya
S06adsp55-u:546: dūrīkariṣyāmi śrāvakapratyekabhūmī āsanno 'smin [f. 229a] sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃ na abhyavakāśasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:547: kasyacid ahaṃ dūre vā 'bhyāśe vā. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:548: abhadatvād acalatvād bhagavann abhyavakāśasya avikalpatvād bhagavann abhyavakāśasya. evam eva bhagavan (AdSPG I 55)
S06adsp55-u:549: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:550: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mama abhyāśe. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:551: avikalpatvād bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃ māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:555: eṣa me dūre vā 'bhyāśe vā. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:556: avikalpatvād bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya. evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:557: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mama abhyāśe. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan na pratibimbasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:558: yena āraṃbaṇena pratibimbam utpannaṃ tat mama abhyāśe,
S06adsp55-u:559: ye punar atra upasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te me dūre. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:560: avikalpatvād bhagavan pratibimbasya. evam eva bhagavam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:561: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre,
S06adsp55-u:562: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mama abhyāśe. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:563: avikalpatvāt punar bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā. na hi bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ priyo vā apriyo vā asti. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:565: yasya priyo vā apriyo vā bhavet. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na kaścit priyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate,
S06adsp55-u:566: evam eva bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā na kaścit priyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvakalpavikalpaprahīṇaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:569: avikalpatām upadāya. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan na tathāgatanirmitasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:570: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre,
S06adsp55-u:571: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mama abhyāśe. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:572: avikalpatvād bhagavaṃs tathāgatasya tathāgatanirmitasya ca. evam eva bhagavan na bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:573: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre,
S06adsp55-u:574: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mama abhyāśe. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgato nirmitaṃ nirmimīta sa yasya kāryasya kṛte nirmitas tat kāryaṃ karoti,
S06adsp55-u:576: evam eva bhagavan yasya kāryasya kṛte prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate tac ca kāryaṃ karoti,
S06adsp55-u:577: sā ca prajñāpāramitā avikalpā nirvikalpā. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevasinā vā yantraṃ yuktaṃ syāt strivigraho vā puruṣavigraho vā,
S06adsp55-u:579: balīvardavigraho vā. tac ca yadṛśasya kāryasya kṛte kṛtaṃ tat kāryaṃ karoti. tac ca yantram avikalpaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:580: evam eva bhagavan yasya kṛtyasya kṛte prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate,
S06adsp55-u:581: tat kāryaṃ karoti. sā ca prajñāpāramitā avikalpā. athāyuṣmāñc chāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:582: [f. 229b] kiṃ punar āyuṣmaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāiva avikalpā utāho dhyānapāramitā api,
S06adsp55-u:585: dhyānapāramitā apy āyuṣmañc chāradvātīputra avikalpā. yāvad dānapāramitā apy avikalpā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:586: kiṃ punar āyuṣmaṃ subhūte rūpam apy avikalpaṃ yāvad vijñānam apy avikalpaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:587: cakṣur apy avikalpaṃ yāvad mano 'py avikalpaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:588: kiṃ punar rūpam apy avikalpaṃ (AdSPG I 57)
S06adsp55-u:591: apy avikalpaṃ yāvad manovijñānam apy avikalpaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:593: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā api vedanā avikalpā yāvan manahsaṃsparśajā api vedanā avikalpāḥ?
S06adsp55-u:594: kiṃ punar dhyānāny apramāṇāny ārūpyasamāpattayo 'py avikalpā?
S06adsp55-u:595: smṛtyupasthānāny api yāvan mārgo 'pi śūnyatā ānimittam apraṇihitam apy avikalpaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:596_0: kiṃ punar daśatathāgatabalāni. catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī
S06adsp55-u:596_1: mahākaruṇā apy avikalpāḥ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddharmā apy avikalpā bodhir apy avikalpā
S06adsp55-u:598: sarvadharmā apy āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra avikalpāḥ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:599: yady āyuṣmaṃ subhūte sarvadharmā apy avikalpāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:600: kuto 'yaṃ paṃcagatikaḥ saṃsāra iti bheda āgataḥ narakatiryagyoniyamalokadevamanuṣyāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:601: kuta iyaṃ prabhāvanā śrotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ?
S06adsp55-u:603: ye te āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra sattvā viparyāsasamutthitaṃ karma abhisaṃskurvanti kāyena vācā manasā,
S06adsp55-u:604_0: teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇy āyatanāny abhinirvartante. cchandamūlakaṃ karmavipākaṃ parigṛhya
S06adsp55-u:605: kutaḥ punaḥ śrotaāpannā prabhāvyante sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā,
S06adsp55-u:607: kutas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prabhāvyanta iti?
S06adsp55-u:608: avikalpataḥ āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra śrotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante (AdSPG I 58)
S06adsp55-u:611: avikalpato buddhāḥ avikalpato bodhiḥ. ye 'pi te āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra abhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās,
S06adsp55-u:612: te 'py āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra buddhā bhagavantaḥ avikalpā vikalpaprahīnāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:613_0: evam anāgatā apy avikalpā bhaviṣyanti. ye 'pi te śāradvatīputra etarhi daśasu dikṣu
S06adsp55-u:613_1: lokadhātuṣu pratyutpanne 'dhvani buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhās
S06adsp55-u:613_2: te 'py āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra buddhā bhagavantaḥ avikalpā vikalpaprahīṇāḥ. tad
S06adsp55-u:613_3: anena te āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:614_0: sarvadharmā avikalpā avikalpatathatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya bhūtakoṭitathatān dharmadhātutathatāṃ
S06adsp55-u:614_1: pramāṇikṛtya. evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena avikalpāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:615: avikalpāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann avikalpān sarvadharmān abhisaṃbudhyate. ((58))
S06adsp55-u:618: atha āyuṣmañc charadvatīputra ayuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:619_0: sāre vatāyam [f. 230a] āyuṣmaṃ subhūte carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:619_1: carati. sāre vatāyaṃ carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. evam ukte āyuṣmāṃ subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ
S06adsp55-u:620: asāre vatāyaṃ caraty āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:621: tathā hy āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra asārikā prajñāpāramitā yāvad asārikā sarvākārajñatā. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:622_0: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann asāram eva nopalabhate
S06adsp55-u:622_1: na samanupaśyati. kutaḥ punaḥ sāram upalapsyate. yāvad asārikāṃ sarvākārajñatāṃ nopalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:622_2: kutaḥ punaḥ sāram upalapsyate. atha saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhūn:
S06adsp55-u:623_0: namaskaraṇīyās te kulaputrāś ca kuladuhitaraś ca yair anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
S06adsp55-u:623_1: cittam utpāditaṃ ye ceha gaṃbhirāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ caranti. atra
S06adsp55-u:623_2: ca arthe caranti. na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkurvanti. yāṃ sākṣātkṛtya śrāvakabhūmau
S06adsp55-u:623_3: vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā avatiṣṭheran. anena api paryāyeṇa namaskaraṇīyās te bodhisattvā
S06adsp55-u:623_4: mahāsattvā ya imān dharmatāṃ na sākṣātkurvanti. athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:625_0: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ya imān dharmatāṃ na sākṣātkurvanti yaya sākṣātkṛyayā
S06adsp55-u:625_1: śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā avatiṣṭherann. idaṃ teṣāṃ devaputrā duṣkarataraṃ
S06adsp55-u:625_2: yad aprameya asaṃkhyeya aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti sannāhaṃ sannahyanti.
S06adsp55-u:625_3: te ca sattvā atyantatayā nopalabhyante yāṃ parinirvāpayeyuḥ. evaṃ cāran bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:625_4: mahāsattvaḥ saṃprasthito bhavaty anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye sarvasattvān vineṣyāmi
S06adsp55-u:626: yaḥ sattvān vinetavyaṃ manyeta. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:628: ākāśaśūnyatayā sattvaśūnyatā draṣṭavyā. ākāśāsāratayā sattvāsāratā draṣṭavyā,
S06adsp55-u:629_0: ākāśatucchatayā sattvatucchatā draṣṭavyā. anena api devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā
S06adsp55-u:629_1: bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ye avidyamānānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛte sannāhaṃ sannahyanti. ākāśena
S06adsp55-u:629_2: te sārdhaṃ vivaditukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛte sannāhaṃ sannahyanti. sa ca sannāho bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:629_3: mahāsattvena sannaddhas te ca sattvā nopalabhyante yeṣāṃ sattvānām arthāya bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:629_4: mahāsattvena sannāhaḥ sannaddhas. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:630: sattvaviviktatayā sannāhaviviktatā draṣṭavyā. saced evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
S06adsp55-u:631: carati bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:633: subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ cittaṃ na avalīyate na saṃlīyate na cāsya mānasaṃ saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06adsp55-u:634: carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. atha bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:635: kena kāraṇena subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na [f. 230b] saṃsīdati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ?
S06adsp55-u:636: āha: asattvād bhagavaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ na saṃsīdati bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06adsp55-u:637_0: viviktatvāc chāntatvād anutpādatvād bhagavaṃ na saṃsīdati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:637_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. anena bhagavan kāraṇena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:638_0: tathā hi sa bhagavaṃ nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃsīded yena vā saṃsīded yatra vā saṃsīdet.
S06adsp55-u:638_1: sarva ete dharmā na saṃvidyante. saced bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe
S06adsp55-u:638_2: na saṃsīdati na viṣīdati. na līyate na avalīyate na saṃlīyate,
S06adsp55-u:639: nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate. carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:640_0: tathā hi bhagavan sarva ete dharmā na saṃvidyante yo vā saṃsīded yena vā saṃsīded
S06adsp55-u:640_1: yatra vā saṃsīdet. evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sendrakair devāiḥ
S06adsp55-u:641_0: na kevalaṃ subhūte sendrakair devaiḥ sabrahmakaiḥ saprajāpatikair namasyate. bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:641_1: mahāsattvo ya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. ye 'pi te abhikrāntā abhikrāntavarṇāḥ
S06adsp55-u:641_2: śubhakṛtsnā vṛhatphalāḥ yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrās te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ (AdSPG I 62)
S06adsp55-u:642: mahāsattvaṃ namasyaṃti ya evaṃ prajñāparamitāyāṃ carati. ye 'pi te subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā asaṃkhyeyāprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti,
S06adsp55-u:643_0: te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti. ayaṃ
S06adsp55-u:643_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyati. yāvat
S06adsp55-u:643_2: sarvākārajñatāṃ paripūrayiṣyati. yaṃ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:643_3: carantaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāharanti. sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhatvapratipannako
S06adsp55-u:643_4: dhārayitavyaḥ. yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te sarve
S06adsp55-u:644: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tāvanto mārān pāpīyāṃso 'bhinirmimīta,
S06adsp55-u:645_0: te sarve apratibalās tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyaṃ kartuṃ. dvābhyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:645_1: subhūte dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ.
S06adsp55-u:646_0: sarvadharmaś ca anena sūnyatā vyavalokitā bhavanti. sarvasattvāś ca asya aparityaktā
S06adsp55-u:646_1: bhavanti. ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo māhasattvo
S06adsp55-u:646_2: durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ. aparābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato
S06adsp55-u:647: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ. katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ?
S06adsp55-u:649_0: buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhiḥ samanvāhṛyate. ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato
S06adsp55-u:649_1: bodhisattvo mahāsasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ. evaṃ (AdSPG I 63)
S06adsp55-u:650: carantaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya te devaputrā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante. paryupāsiṣyante pariprakṣyanti paripraśnayiṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:652_0: kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra buddhabodhim anuprāpsyasi. tasmāt tarhi tvaṃ kulaputra anenaiva
S06adsp55-u:652_1: vihāreṇa vihara yaduta śūnyatāvihāreṇa animittavihāreṇa apraṇihitavihāreṇa. [f. 231a] tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:653_0: anena tvaṃ kulaputra vihāreṇa viharann anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyasy aśaraṇānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:653_1: sattvānāṃ śaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyasy atrāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ trāṇāṃ bhaviṣyasy aparāyaṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:653_2: parāyaṇaṃ bhaviṣyasy alayanānāṃ sattvānāṃ layanaṃ bhaviṣyasy advīpānāṃ sattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:653_3: dvīpo bhaviṣyasy andhabhūtānāṃ sattvānām ālokabhūto bhaviṣyasi iti. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:654_0: tathā hy anena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye 'pi
S06adsp55-u:654_1: te aprameyāsaṃkheyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhaṃti dhṛyaṃte yāpayanti
S06adsp55-u:654_2: dharmañ ca deśayaṃti bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtā yo 'sau prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraty ebhir
S06adsp55-u:654_3: guṇaiḥ samanvāgato yaduta prajñāpāramitāguṇais tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06adsp55-u:654_4: nāmaṃ ca gotraṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ ca udānayaṃti. tadyathāpi
S06adsp55-u:654_5: nāma subhūte aham etarhi ratnaketor bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo
S06adsp55-u:654_6: dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi. sikhinaś ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:654_7: parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi. ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
S06adsp55-u:655_0: samyaksaṃbuddhasya antike brahmacaryaṃ caranty anayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitās
S06adsp55-u:655_1: teṣām apy ahaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ
S06adsp55-u:655_2: deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi. ye 'pi te pūrvasyān diśi buddhā bhagavaṃtas tiṣṭhaṃti
S06adsp55-u:656_0: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caranty anayā prajñāpāramitayā
S06adsp55-u:656_1: avirahitās teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavaṃtaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ
S06adsp55-u:656_2: codānayanti. evaṃ ye 'pi te dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād
S06adsp55-u:656_3: yāvat samaṃtād daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavaṃtas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayaṃti,
S06adsp55-u:657_0: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranty anayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitās
S06adsp55-u:657_1: teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavaṃtaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:657_2: ye 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhimārgaṃ ca pariśodhayaṃti,
S06adsp55-u:659: teṣām api te buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayaṃty udānaṃ codānayaṃti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:660: evaṃ duṣkarakārakā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti,
S06adsp55-u:662: katameṣāṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpāś te buddhā bhagavaṃto dharman deśayaṃti. avaivartikānām atha vaivartikānāṃ?
S06adsp55-u:664: asti subhūte [f. 231b] bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avaivartikā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃti. asty avyākṛtakā bodhisattvā (AdSPG I 65)
S06adsp55-u:665: mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃti. teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavaṃtaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayaṃty udānaṃ codānayaṃti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:668_0: ye akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ caraṃte
S06adsp55-u:668_1: 'nuśikṣamāṇarūpā viharanti. ime te subhūte avaivartikā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yeṣāṃ
S06adsp55-u:668_2: te buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti. ye
S06adsp55-u:668_3: 'pi te subhūte ratnaketor bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacārikāṃ
S06adsp55-u:668_4: caraṃti. teṣām api te buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayanty udānaṃ
S06adsp55-u:668_5: codānayaṃti. punar aparaṃ subhūte ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06adsp55-u:669_0: sarvadharmāṇām anutpattikatāyām adhimuktā na ca anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā.
S06adsp55-u:669_1: sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ity adhimuktā na ca anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā.
S06adsp55-u:669_2: sarvadharmāḥ śāntā ity adhimuktā na ca anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā.
S06adsp55-u:669_3: sarvadharmā riktakā iti tucchakā iti vaśikā ity asārakā ity adhimuktā na ca anutpattikeṣu
S06adsp55-u:669_4: dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā. eṣām api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā
S06adsp55-u:669_5: bhagavantaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti. yeṣām api subhūte
S06adsp55-u:669_6: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ buddhā bhagavaṃto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharman
S06adsp55-u:669_7: deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti. teṣām api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prahīṇāḥ
S06adsp55-u:669_8: śrāvakabhūmi pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca vyākṛyaṃte te 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. yasya
S06adsp55-u:670_0: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato buddhā bhagavaṃto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā
S06adsp55-u:670_1: dharman deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti. sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avaivartikatāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:670_2: sthāsyati. yatra sthitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo
