S06adsp55-u:670_3: mahāsattvo gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā na kāṃkṣiṣyati. na vicikitsiṣyati na dhandhāyiṣyate,
S06adsp55-u:671_0: evam etad yathā tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitam iti. sa punar eva vistareṇa
S06adsp55-u:671_1: śroṣyaty akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya antikāt teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:673_0: imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitāṃ tathā adhimucyamāna avaivartikatāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:673_1: sthāsyati. evaṃ bahukaro hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā śravaḥ
S06adsp55-u:673_2: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'dhimokṣyaṃte adhimucya tathatvāya sthāsyanti. tathātvāya pratipatsyante
S06adsp55-u:673_3: tathātvāya sthitvā tathātvāya pratipadya sthāsyanti sarvākārajñātāyāṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:674: yat punar bhagayaṃ tathātvāya [f. 232a] sthitvā yat pratipadya na kaścid dharmam upalapsyate. kathaṃ sthāsyati sarvākārajñatāyāṃ?
S06adsp55-u:675_0: yad bhagavaṃs tathāgatanirmito na kaṃcid dharmam upalabhyate ko 'yaṃ tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati
S06adsp55-u:675_1: ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate ko vā tathatāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:676: tathataiva tāvaṃ nopalabhyate kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tathatāyāṃ sthitvā (AdSPG I 67)
S06adsp55-u:677: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati. nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:678_0: yat subhūtir evam āha. na ca tathāgatanirmito 'nyaṃ kiṃcid dharmam upalabhate yas
S06adsp55-u:678_1: tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhet tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:678_2: tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayet. tathataiva tāvan nopalabhyate. kaḥ punar vādo
S06adsp55-u:678_3: yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:678_4: tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati. nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. evam etat subhūte
S06adsp55-u:678_5: evam etat tathā yathā vadasi. na subhūte tathāgatanirmito 'nyaṃ kaṃcid dharmam upalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:678_6: yas tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhet tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta,
S06adsp55-u:679_0: tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayet. tathataiva tāvan nopalabhyate kaḥ punar vādo
S06adsp55-u:679_1: yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:679_2: tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati. nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:680_0: utpādād vā subhūte tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ
S06adsp55-u:680_1: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā. dharmatā sthita evaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmadhātur dharmasthititā
S06adsp55-u:680_2: dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ. neha subhūte tathatāyāṃ kaścit sthāsyati. na tathatāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:680_3: sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. na tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman
S06adsp55-u:681: tathā hy atra tathatāyāṃ notpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitasyānyathātvaṃ. tad yasya dharmasya nāpy utpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitasyānyathātvaṃ (AdSPG I 68)
S06adsp55-u:682_0: na tatra kaścit sthāsyati. nāpi tatra sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:682_1: kutaḥ punas tatra sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati. nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. atha śakro
S06adsp55-u:683: gaṃbhīreyaṃ bhagavaṃ. prajñāpāramitā. duṣkarakārakā bhagavaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:684_0: na ca nāma bhagavaṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate nāpi kaścit tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati nāpi
S06adsp55-u:684_1: kaścid anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyate nāpi kaścid dharman deśayati. tatra
S06adsp55-u:684_2: ca nāvalīyante na caiṣāṃ kāṃkṣayitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā bhavati. atha subhūti
S06adsp55-u:684_3: sthaviraḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:685_0: yat kauśikaivaṃ vadasi duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yeṣām iha gaṃbhīreṣu
S06adsp55-u:685_1: dharmeṣu na bhavati kāṃkṣayitatvaṃ vā dhaṃdhāyitatvaṃ veti. śūnyeṣu kauśika sarvadharmeṣu
S06adsp55-u:685_2: kasyātra kāṃkṣayitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā bhaviṣyati?
S06adsp55-u:686_0: śakra āha: yad subhūtir sthaviro nirdiśati. tat sarvaṃ śūnyatām eva ārabhya nirdiśati.
S06adsp55-u:686_1: na kvacit sajjati. tadyathāpi nāma iṣur antarīkṣe kṣipto na kvacit sajjaty evam eva
S06adsp55-u:686_2: subhūte sthavirasya [f. 232b] dharmadeśanā na kvacit sajjati. ((59))
S06adsp55-u:689: atha śakro devanām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:690: kaceid ahaṃ bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśann uktavādī ca bhagavato dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmatām samyak vyākurvaṃ vyākaromi?
S06adsp55-u:692: sa khalu tvaṃ kauśikaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśaṃs tathāgatasyoktavādī ca dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmatāṃ vyākaroṣi. śakra āha:
S06adsp55-u:693_0: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad idaṃ subhūte sthavirasya pratibhāti. sarvaṃ taṃc chūnyatām
S06adsp55-u:693_1: evārabhya pratibhāty ānimittam eva apraṇihitam evārabhya pratibhāti. smṛtyupasthānāny
S06adsp55-u:693_2: evārabhya pratibhāti yāvan mārgam evārabhya pratibhāti. adhyātmaśūnyatām evārabhya
S06adsp55-u:693_3: pratibhāti yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām evārabhya pratibhāti. yāvad bodhim evārabhya
S06adsp55-u:694_0: subhūtiḥ kauśika sthavira śūnyatayā viharan dānapāramitām eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar
S06adsp55-u:694_1: vādo yaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ carati. śīlapāramitām eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ
S06adsp55-u:694_2: śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitām
S06adsp55-u:694_3: eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. smṛtyupasthānāny eva
S06adsp55-u:694_4: nopalabhate kaḥ punar vādo ya smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati. yāvan mārgam eva nopalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:694_5: kaḥ punar vādo yo mārgaṃ bhāvayati. adhyātmaśūnyatām eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo
S06adsp55-u:695_0: bhavayati. yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yo 'bhāvasvabhāśūnyatāṃ
S06adsp55-u:695_1: bhāvayati. āryasatyāny eva nopalabhate kaḥ punar vādo yo āryasatyāni bhāvayati. evaṃ
S06adsp55-u:695_2: dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīr eva nopalabhate kaḥ punar vādo yo dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīn
S06adsp55-u:695_3: bhāvayati. balāny eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yo balāni bhāvayati. vaiśāradyāny
S06adsp55-u:695_4: eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yo vaiśāradyāny abhinirharati. pratisaṃvida eva nopalabhate
S06adsp55-u:695_5: kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ pratisāṃvido 'bhinirharati. mahākaruṇām eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar
S06adsp55-u:695_6: vādo yo mahākaruṇāvihārī bhavati. āveṇikabuddhadharmān eva nopalabhate kaḥ punar
S06adsp55-u:695_7: vādo ya āveṇikabuddhadharmān abhinirharati. bodhim eva nopalabhate,
S06adsp55-u:696_0: kaḥ punar vādo yo bodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. sarvākārajñatām eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar
S06adsp55-u:696_1: vādo yas sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. tathāgatam eva nopalabhate kaḥ punar vādo yas
S06adsp55-u:696_2: tathāgato bhavati. anutpādam eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yo 'nutpādaṃ sākṣātkaroti.
S06adsp55-u:696_3: lakṣaṇāny eva nopalabhate kaḥ punar vādo yasya lakṣaṇāni kāye bhavaṃti. anuvyaṃjanāny
S06adsp55-u:696_4: eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yasya anuvyaṃjanāni kāye bhavanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:697_0: sarvadharmaviviktavihārī hi kausika subhūti sthavira anupalambhavihāri śūnyatāvihārī
S06adsp55-u:697_1: ānimittavihārī apraṇihitavihārī. ya eṣa kauśika subhūte sthavirasya vihāraḥ sa bodhisattvasya
S06adsp55-u:697_2: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyaṃ carato vihārasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti. sahasratamīm
S06adsp55-u:697_3: api śatasahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm [f. 233a] api saṃkhyām api kalām (AdSPG I 71)
S06adsp55-u:698: api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:699_0: tathāgatavihāraṃ sthāpayitvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato
S06adsp55-u:699_1: yo vihāro yaś ca śrāvakānāṃ vihāro yaś ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ vihāra eṣāṃ vihārāṇām
S06adsp55-u:699_2: ayam eva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato vihāro 'grya ākhyāyate
S06adsp55-u:699_3: jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭha ākhyāyate varaḥ pravaraḥ praṇīta ākhyāyāte anuttaro niruttara ākhyāyate.
S06adsp55-u:699_4: tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānām agryatāṃ gantukāmena
S06adsp55-u:701_0: atra hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabūmim
S06adsp55-u:701_1: atikrāmati. bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati. bodhisattvanyāmam avakramya buddhadharmān
S06adsp55-u:701_2: paripūrayati. buddhadharmān paripūrya sarvākārajñatājñānam anuprāpnoti. sarvākārajñatājñānam
S06adsp55-u:701_3: anuprāpnuvantas tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvavāsanānusandhikleśaprahāṇaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:702_0: atha tasyām eva parṣadi devās trayastriṃśā māndaravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā bhagavantam
S06adsp55-u:702_1: avakiranti sma abhyavakiranti sma abhiprakiranti sma. ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ ca bhikṣuśatam
S06adsp55-u:702_2: utthāyasanād ekāṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇāṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
S06adsp55-u:702_3: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya animiṣābhyāṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ bhagavantaṃ prekṣamāṇā
S06adsp55-u:702_4: namasyanti sma. atha buddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ te 'ñjalayaḥ praṇamayanto māṇḍāravaiḥ
S06adsp55-u:702_5: puṣpaiḥ paripūrṇā abhūvan. te tair māndāravaiḥ puṣpais (AdSPG I 72)
S06adsp55-u:703: tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham avakiranti sma abhyavakiranti sma abhiprakiranti sma. avakiranto 'bhyavakiranto 'bhiprakirantaḥ evaṃ c)
S06adsp55-u:705: vayaṃ bhagavann anena kuśalamūlena anena uttamavihāreṇa viharema. yatra agatiḥ. sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ.
S06adsp55-u:706: atha bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇām āśayaṃ viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādurakarṣīd. dharmatā khalu punar buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yadā smitam āviṣkurvanti,
S06adsp55-u:707: atha tāvad eva anekavarṇā nānāvarṇā arciṣo mukhadvārān niścaranti,
S06adsp55-u:709_0: te trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsena spharitvā punar eva āgamya bhagavantaṃ
S06adsp55-u:709_1: triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mūrdhany antardhīyante sma. athāyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād
S06adsp55-u:709_2: ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs
S06adsp55-u:710: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasyāviṣkuraṇe,
S06adsp55-u:711: na ahetu na apratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitam āviṣkurvanti. evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:712_0: idam ānanda ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ śataṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tārakopame kalpe 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06adsp55-u:712_1: abhisaṃbhotsyante. avakīrṇakusumanāmānas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke
S06adsp55-u:712_2: bhaviṣyanti. teṣāṃ khalu punar ānanda avakīrṇakusumanāmakānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ
S06adsp55-u:713_0: bhikṣusaṃgho bhaviṣyati. samaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati. samāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:713_1: yaduta varṣasahasraṃ. yato yato 'bhiniṣkramiṣyanty [f. 233b] abhiniṣkramya pravrajiṣyanti.
S06adsp55-u:713_2: pravrajya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. tatra tatra pañcavarṇikānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:713_3: kusumānāṃ kusumavarṣam abhipravarṣiṣyati. tasmāt tarhy ānanda uttamavihāreṇa vihartukāmena
S06adsp55-u:713_4: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. tathāgatavihāreṇa vihartukāmena
S06adsp55-u:713_5: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. yo hi kaścid ānanda kulaputro
S06adsp55-u:713_6: vā kuladuhitā vā iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati. niṣṭhā tena ānanda
S06adsp55-u:715_0: tuṣitebhyo vā devanikāyebhyaś cyutvā iha upapanno. manuṣyeṣv eveyaṃ gaṃbhīrā prajñāpāramitā
S06adsp55-u:715_1: vistareṇa śrutā bhaviṣyati. tuṣiteṣu vā devanikāyeṣv iyaṃ gaṃbhīrā prajñāpāramitā
S06adsp55-u:715_2: vistareṇa śrutā bhaviṣyati. tathāgatavyavalokitās te ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
S06adsp55-u:715_3: draṣṭavyā ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti. yo hi kaścid ānanda kulaputro
S06adsp55-u:715_4: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyanti
S06adsp55-u:715_5: dhārayiṣyanti. vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:716: bodhisattvayānikāṃś ca pudgalāṃś ceha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyaty anuśāsiṣyati niṣṭhā tena ānanda bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena gantavyā,
S06adsp55-u:717: saṃmukhaṃ mayā teṣāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antikād iyaṃ (AdSPG I 74)
S06adsp55-u:718: gaṃbhirā prajñāpāramitā śrutā bhaviṣyaty udgṛhītā ca dhāritā ca vā citā ca paryavāptā ca bhaviṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:719: tatra ca tathāgateṣv arhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni bhaviṣyanti. veditavyam ānanda tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā,
S06adsp55-u:720: na mayā śrāvakāṇām antike kusalamūlāny avaropitāni,
S06adsp55-u:721: na śrāvakāṇām antikād iyaṃ gaṃbhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutā. yo hi kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:723: arthataś ca dharmataś ca vyañjanataś ca anugamiṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:724: niṣṭhā ānanda tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā gantavyā,
S06adsp55-u:725_0: saṃmukhībhūto me tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. yo hi kaścid ānanda kulaputro
S06adsp55-u:725_1: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā na pratikrokṣyanti
S06adsp55-u:725_2: na prativakṣyanti śrutvā ca prasādaṃ pratilapsyante,
S06adsp55-u:726_0: pūrvajinakṛtādhikāraḥ sa ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ. avaropitakuśalumūlaḥ
S06adsp55-u:726_1: kalyāṇamitraparigṛhitāḥ. kiṃ cāpy ānanda yena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatānām
S06adsp55-u:727: na tad visaṃvadiṣyati. śrāvakatve vā pratyekabuddhatve vā. api tu khalu punar ānanda supratividdhena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:730: yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ [f. 234a] caratā. supratividdho hy ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃc,
S06adsp55-u:731: chīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran,
S06adsp55-u:733_0: caran na śrāvakatve vā pratyekabuddhatve vā sthāsyati. tasmāt tarhy ānanda anuparindāmi
S06adsp55-u:733_1: te imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ. sacet tvam ānanda yo mayā dharmo deśitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06adsp55-u:733_2: sthāpayitvā sarvāṃ tāṃ dharmadeśanām udgṛhya paryavāpsa punar eva nāśayeḥ,
S06adsp55-u:735_0: na me tvam ānanda tāvatāparādhye. sacen tvam ānanda imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya
S06adsp55-u:735_1: ekapadam api nāśayes tāvatā me tvam ānanda aparādhye. sacet tvam ānanda imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ
S06adsp55-u:735_2: prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya punar eva na nāśaye punar eva notsṛjeś tāvatā me tvam ānanda
S06adsp55-u:736_0: anuparindāmi te imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathodgṛhya dhāraye. vācayet paryavāpnuyā
S06adsp55-u:736_1: sumanasikṛtā ca kartavyā suparigṛhitā ca suparyavāptā ca svādhāritā ca kartavyā susanāptair
S06adsp55-u:736_2: akṣarapadavyañjanai suniruktā ca sūdgṛhītā ca kartavyā. yo hi kaścid ānanda kulaputro
S06adsp55-u:736_3: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
S06adsp55-u:737_0: paryavāpsyaty atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhir dhāritā
S06adsp55-u:737_1: bhaviṣyati. yo hi kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām
S06adsp55-u:737_2: udgrahīṣyaty atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhir anuparigṛhītā
S06adsp55-u:737_3: bhaviṣyati. ya icchet mama ānanda saṃmukhībhūtaṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ. (AdSPG I 76)
S06adsp55-u:738_0: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhi.
S06adsp55-u:738_1: teneyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā udgṛhya
S06adsp55-u:738_2: dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā,
S06adsp55-u:739: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ. prajñāpāramitāṃ satkurvatāṃ gurukurvatāṃ mānayatāṃ pūjayatām ahaṃ ca tena pūjito bhaviṣyāmy,
S06adsp55-u:740_0: atītānāgatapratyutpannāś ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūjitā bhaviṣyanti. yo hi kaścid ānanda
S06adsp55-u:740_1: asyāṃ gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ gauravaṃ ca premaṃ ca prasādaṃ
S06adsp55-u:740_2: ca utpādayiṣyati atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike tena premaś
S06adsp55-u:740_3: ca prasādaś ca gauravaṃ cotpāditaṃ bhaviṣyati. yadi te ānanda ahaṃ priyaś ca manaāpaś ca aparityaktaś ca,
S06adsp55-u:741_0: tan te ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā priyā ca manaāpā ca aparityaktā ca bhavatu. yathaikapadam
S06adsp55-u:741_1: api te ito gaṃbhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā na nāśayitavyaṃ. subahv api te ānanda bhāṣeyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:741_2: prajñāpāramitāyā parindānām ārabhya. saṃkṣiptena ānanda yādṛśa eva ahaṃ te śāstās
S06adsp55-u:742_0: tasmāt tarhy ānanda apramāṇayā parindānayā te 'ham imāṃ prajñāpāramitām anuparindāmi.
S06adsp55-u:742_1: tasmāt tarhy ānanda sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya purata ārocayāmi. yasyāparityakto
S06adsp55-u:742_2: buddhaḥ aparityakto dharmaḥ aparityaktaḥ saṃghaḥ aparityaktā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannā
S06adsp55-u:742_3: buddhā bhagavanta. aparityaktā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhis,
S06adsp55-u:743: tasyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā aparityaktā bhavatu. iyam asmākam anuśāsanī. yo hi kaścid ānanda (AdSPG I 77)
S06adsp55-u:744_0: kulaputro va kuladuhitā vā imaṃ gaṃbhirāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati. dhārayiṣyati
S06adsp55-u:744_1: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pattīyeṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. pareṣāṃ cemāṃ
S06adsp55-u:744_2: gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa vistareṇa ākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prajñāpayiṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:745_0: prasthāpayiṣyati vivariṣyati vibhajiṣyati uttānīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati sa khalu
S06adsp55-u:745_1: punar ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kṣipram eva anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp55-u:745_2: abhyāśī bhaviṣyati sarvākārajñatāyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:746_0: prajnāpāramitāniryātā hy ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir. ye
S06adsp55-u:746_1: 'pi te ānanda abhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās teṣām api
S06adsp55-u:746_2: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. ye 'pi te
S06adsp55-u:746_3: ānanda bhaviṣyanty anāgāte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās teṣām api
S06adsp55-u:746_4: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. ye 'pi te
S06adsp55-u:746_5: ānanda etarhi pūrvasyān diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād
S06adsp55-u:746_6: yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti
S06adsp55-u:746_7: dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva
S06adsp55-u:746_8: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tasmāt tarhy ānanda anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena
S06adsp55-u:746_9: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena. ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritavyaṃ. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:747: eṣā hy ānanda bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ janetrī yaduta prajñāpāramitā. ye hi kecid (AdSPG I 78)
S06adsp55-u:748_0: ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣiṣyanti. sarve te niryāsyanty
S06adsp55-u:748_1: anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tasmāt tarhy ānanda imāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ bhūyasyā mātrayā
S06adsp55-u:749: eṣā hy ānanda tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmakośaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:750_0: akṣayo hy eṣa dharmakośo yaduta ṣaṭpāramitākośaḥ. ye 'pi te ānanda pūrvasyāṃ diśi
S06adsp55-u:750_1: dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu
S06adsp55-u:750_2: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ
S06adsp55-u:750_3: ca deśayanti. te 'py ānanda buddhā bhagavanta iha eva ṣaṭpāramitākośād dharmaṃ deśayanti.
S06adsp55-u:750_4: ye 'pi te ānanda abhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py
S06adsp55-u:750_5: atraiva ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā dharman
S06adsp55-u:750_6: deśayanta. ye 'pi te ānanda bhaviṣyanty anāgāte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06adsp55-u:750_7: te 'py atraiva ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06adsp55-u:750_8: dharman deśayanti. [f. 235a] ye 'pi te anantātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:750_9: bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāḥ sarve te ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā parinirvṛtāś ca parinirvānti
S06adsp55-u:750_10: ca parinirvāpayiṣyanti ca. sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvavakabhūmim
S06adsp55-u:750_11: ārabhya dharman deśayes tayā ca dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
S06adsp55-u:750_12: sattvās te sarve arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryuḥ adyāpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na
S06adsp55-u:751: tvam ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaikapadam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayeḥ,
S06adsp55-u:754_0: śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet. yā ca paurvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre
S06adsp55-u:754_1: lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'nupūrvacaramam arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryus teṣāṃ ca arhatāṃ
S06adsp55-u:754_2: yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu. tat kiṃ manyase
S06adsp55-u:754_3: ānanda api nu tad bahu bhavet?
S06adsp55-u:755: āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:756: ataḥ sa ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved yaḥ śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharman deśayed antaśa ekadivasam api,
S06adsp55-u:757: tiṣṭhatv ānandaikadivasaḥ saced ānanda ardhadivasam api,
S06adsp55-u:758: tiṣṭhatv ānanda ardhadivasaḥ. saced ānanda yāvat purobhaktam api,
S06adsp55-u:759: saced yāvan nāḍikāntaraṃ vā saced yāvad acchaṭāntaraṃ vā,
S06adsp55-u:760_0: saced yāvat kṣaṇaṃ vā lavaṃ vā muhūrttaṃ vā. ayam eva ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaveti
S06adsp55-u:760_1: yaḥ śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ
S06adsp55-u:760_2: dharman deśayet sa sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ
S06adsp55-u:760_3: ca kuśalamūlam abhibhavati. sacet punar ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvayānikānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:760_4: pudgalānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharman deśayet antaśa ekadivasam apy ardhadivasam
S06adsp55-u:760_5: api purobhaktam api nāḍikāntaram api kṣaṇaṃ vā lavaṃ vā muhūrttaṃ vā,
S06adsp55-u:761: ayam ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca kuśalamūlam abhibhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:763_0: ātmanā ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ paraṃ ca anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06adsp55-u:763_1: samādāpayati saṃharṣayati samuttejayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati. evam ānanda bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:763_2: mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃś caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu,
S06adsp55-u:764: yāvan mārgākārajñatāyāṃ caraṃ kuśalamulair vivardhamānaḥ asthānam ānanda anavakāśo yad anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ parihīyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06adsp55-u:765_0: asyāṃ khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhagavāṃś catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇāṃ
S06adsp55-u:765_1: tathā sthitānām eva puratas tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yathārūpeṇarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇa
S06adsp55-u:765_2: abhisaṃskṛtena sarve te akṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyanti bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ
S06adsp55-u:765_3: bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaṃ dharman deśayantaṃ sāgaropamayā parṣadā akṣobhyayā,
S06adsp55-u:766_0: sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair
S06adsp55-u:766_1: ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ [f. 235b] kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ
S06adsp55-u:766_3: bodhisattvaiś ca mahāsattvaiḥ sāgaropamabuddhibhiḥ. atha bhagavān punar eva tam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ
S06adsp55-u:766_4: pratisaṃhṛtavān pratisaṃhṛte ca tasmin ṛddhyabhisaṃskāre tāś catasraḥ parṣado na
S06adsp55-u:766_5: bhūyaḥ paśyanti tam akṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:767: śrāvakān vā bodhisattvayānikān vā pudgalaṃs, tac ca (AdSPG I 81)
S06adsp55-u:768: buddhakṣetram akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na bhūyaḥ paśyanti,
S06adsp55-u:769: na bhūyo buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaś cakṣuṣa ābhāsam āgacchati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:770: pratisaṃhṛto hi tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāras. tena tena bhūyaḥ paśyanti. atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayata:
S06adsp55-u:771: paśyasi tvam ānanda tad akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ taṃ ca akṣobhyam tathāgataṃ taṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bodhisattvasaṃghaṃ ca?
S06adsp55-u:772: āha: cakṣuṣo 'pi bhagavaṃs tad buddhakṣetraṃ nābhāsam āgacchati. nāpi sa tathāgato nāpi sa bhikṣusaṃgho nāpi sa bodhisattvasaṃghaḥ. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:773_0: evam eva ānanda sarvadharmā na cakṣuṣa ābhāsam āgacchanti. na dharmo dharmasya ābhāsam
S06adsp55-u:773_1: āgacchati. na dharmo dharmaṃ paśyati. na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti. yathā punar eva akṣobhyas
S06adsp55-u:773_2: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas te ca śrāvakās te ca bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalās
S06adsp55-u:773_3: tac ca buddhakṣetraṃ na cakṣuṣa ābhāsam āgacchati. evaṃ hy ānanda sarvadharmā na
S06adsp55-u:773_4: cakṣuṣa ābhāsam āgacchanti. na dharmo dharmasya ābhāsam āgacchati. na dharmo dharmaṃ
S06adsp55-u:773_5: paśyati. na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti. sarvadharmā hy ānanda ajānakāḥ apaśyakāḥ akriyāsamarthāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:774: nirīhakā agrāhyā hy ānanda sarvadharmā ākaśanirīhakatayā,
S06adsp55-u:776: avedakā hy ānanda sarvadharmāś cittavigatatvāt. viṭhapanapratyupasthānalakṣaṇatvād asārakatāṃ copādāya. evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś (AdSPG I 82)
S06adsp55-u:777_0: carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na ca kiṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇa ānanda
S06adsp55-u:777_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. sarvapāramitāḥ paripūrayitukāmena
S06adsp55-u:777_2: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. eṣā śikṣā agryā ākhyāyate
S06adsp55-u:777_3: jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītā ākhyāyate anuttarā niruttarā ākhyāyate,
S06adsp55-u:778_0: sarvalokahitāya sarvalokasukhāya. anāthānāṃ nāthakarī huddhānujñātā buddhapraśastā.
S06adsp55-u:778_1: yatra sthitvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iman trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ
S06adsp55-u:778_2: dakṣiṇena pāṇinābhyutkṣipya punar eva nikṣipeyuḥ na ca teṣāṃ sattvānām evaṃ bhaved,
S06adsp55-u:779: utkṣipto vāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur nikṣipto vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:780_0: iyaṃ sā ānanda prajñāpāramitā yatra śikṣitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatām atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu
S06adsp55-u:780_1: dharmeṣv asaṃgaṃ jñānadarśanam utpannaṃ. yāvantya ānanda śikṣā sarvāsāṃ śikṣāṇām
S06adsp55-u:780_2: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśikṣā agryā ākhyāyate jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā ākhyāyate varā pravarā ākhyāyate.
S06adsp55-u:780_3: praṇītā ākhyāyate anuttarā niruttarā ākhyāyate. ākāśasya sa ānanda [f. 236a] pramāṇaṃ
S06adsp55-u:780_4: vā paryantaṃ vodgrahītavyaṃ manyeta. yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā paryantaṃ
S06adsp55-u:781: apramāṇā hy ānanda prajñāpāramitā. na mayā ānanda prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇam ākhyātaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:782: nāmakāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyā hy ānanda pramāṇabaddhā na prajñāpāramitā pramāṇabaddhā. ānanda āha:
S06adsp55-u:787_0: viviktatvād ānanda prajñāpārāmitā apramāṇabaddhā. ye 'pi te ānanda abhūvann atīte
S06adsp55-u:787_1: 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pi ita eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prabhāvitā.
S06adsp55-u:787_2: na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣayaṃ gatā. ye 'pi te ānanda bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatāḥ
S06adsp55-u:787_3: arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pi ita eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prabhāvayiṣyanti. na ca
S06adsp55-u:787_4: prajñāpāramitā kṣeṣyate. ye pi 'te ānandaitarhi daśasu dikṣu loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ
S06adsp55-u:787_5: samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpāyanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S06adsp55-u:788: te 'pi buddha bhagavanta ita eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prabhāvyante na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣiyate. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:789_0: ākāśaṃ sa ānanda kṣapayitavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ kṣapayitavyaṃ manyeta.
S06adsp55-u:789_1: na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā na kṣīyate na kṣeṣyate. evaṃ na dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā
S06adsp55-u:789_2: kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitā kṣīṇā na kṣīyate na kṣeṣyate. na hy eṣāṃ
S06adsp55-u:790: yeṣām utpādo nāsti kutas teṣāṃ kṣayaḥ prajñāsyate?
S06adsp55-u:791: atha bhagavān jihvendriyam abhinirmāpayya sarvāntaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ jihvendriyeṇa saṃcchādya āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayata:
S06adsp55-u:792: tasmād tarhy ānanda imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ vistareṇa cakṣīthā deśayeḥ saṃprakāśayeḥ prajñapayeḥ prasthāpayeḥ vivarer vivarer uttānīkuryād vistareṇa (AdSPG I 84)
S06adsp55-u:793: saṃprakāśayeḥ. iha hy ānanda gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā bodhisattsayānikair
S06adsp55-u:794: vā pudgalaiḥ śikṣitavyaṃ. yatra yathānuśiṣṭā śikṣamāṇā svasu svasu bhūmiṣu sthāsyaṃti. iyaṃ punar ānanda gaṃbhīrā prajñāpāramitā sarvākṣarāṇāṃ praveśaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:795_0: iyam ānanda gaṃbhīrā prajñāpāramitā sarvadhāraṇīnāṃ mukhaṃ yatra dhāraṇīmukhe bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:795_1: mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ. imān dhāraṇīn dhārayatāṃ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānāṃ sarvapratibhānapratisaṃvida
S06adsp55-u:795_2: āmukhībhavanti. iyam ānanda prajñāpāramitā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām
S06adsp55-u:795_3: akṣayaḥ saddharmakośaḥ ukto mayā. tasmāt tarhy ānanda ārocayāmi te prativedayāmi
S06adsp55-u:795_4: te ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati. paryavāpṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:795_6: iyaṃ sā ānanda prajñāpāramitā dhāraṇy uktā mayā. yān tvaṃ prajñāpāramitādhāraṇīn
S06adsp55-u:799: gaṃbhirā vateyam tathāgatānāṃ samyakambuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ. yannv ahaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paripṛccheyaṃ. athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:800: akṣayā hi bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:801: ākāśa akṣayatvāt subhūte akṣayā prajñāpāramitā. āha:

S06adsp55-u:804_7: ākāśākṣayatvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. vīryapāramitā ākāśākṣayatvena prajñāpāramitā

S06adsp55-u:804_10: avidyākāśākṣayatvena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. saṃskārākāśāakṣayatvena
S06adsp55-u:805_0: abhinirhartavyā. vijñānākaśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā
S06adsp55-u:805_1: abhinirhartavyā. nāmarūpākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajnāpāramitā
S06adsp55-u:805_2: abhinirhartavyā. ṣaḍāyatanākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā

S06adsp55-u:805_11: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06adsp55-u:805_13: dharmo bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇnasya yadevaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati. evaṃ vyavalokayaṃ
S06adsp55-u:805_14: pratītyasamutpādaṃ sarvajñatājñānaṃ pratilabhate. ya kaścit subhūte anena ākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa
S06adsp55-u:805_15: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati. sa na śrāvakabhūmau vā
S06adsp55-u:806: vā sthāsyati. sthāsyati so 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. ye 'pi kecit subhūte bodhisattvayānikā pudgalā vivartante,
S06adsp55-u:807_0: sarve te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmanasikārān anāgamya vivartante. na ca jānaṃti kathaṃ
S06adsp55-u:807_2: vyavalokitavyaḥ. ye 'pi kecit subhūte bodhisattvayānikā pudgalā vivartante sarve
S06adsp55-u:807_3: te idam upāyakauśalam anāgamya vivartaṃte 'nuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhe. ye 'pi kecit
S06adsp55-u:807_4: subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā na vivartaṃte 'nuttarasyā samyaksaṃbodheḥ sarve te
S06adsp55-u:807_5: imāṃ prajñāpāramitām āgamya na vivartante 'nuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhe. upāyakauśalena
S06adsp55-u:807_6: caivaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā
S06adsp55-u:807_7: vyavalokitavyā abhinirhartavyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ
S06adsp55-u:807_8: vyavalokayan na kaṃcid dharmaṃ paśyaty ahetukam utpadyamānam na kaṃcid dharmaṃ nityaṃ
S06adsp55-u:807_9: samanupaśyati na nirudhyamānaṃ. na kaṃcid dharmam ātmataḥ samanupaśyati. na sattvato
S06adsp55-u:807_10: na jīvato na jaṃtuto na manujato na mānavato na poṣato na pudgalato na kārakato na
S06adsp55-u:807_11: kārāpakato na utthāpakato na samutthāpakato na vedakato na vedayitrīkato na jānakato na paśyakataḥ,
S06adsp55-u:808_0: na nityataḥ samanupaśyati na anityato na sukhato na duḥkhato na ātmato na anātmato
S06adsp55-u:808_1: na śāntato na aśāntataḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratītyasamutpādo
S06adsp55-u:808_2: vyavalokayitavyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā. yasmiṃ subhūte samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva (AdSPG I 88)
S06adsp55-u:811: nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā ātmānaṃ vā anātmānaṃ vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā yāvat sarvākārajñatām na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā,
S06adsp55-u:813: śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā. yasmiṃ subhūte samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:814_0: tasmim [f. 237b] samaye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06adsp55-u:814_1: tam api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati. yena prajñāpāramitāṃ samanupaśyet. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ
S06adsp55-u:814_2: na samanupaśyati. vīryapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati. kṣāntipāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06adsp55-u:814_3: śīlapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati. dānapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati. yāvad bodhiṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06adsp55-u:814_4: tam api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati. yena dharmeṇa bodhiṃ samanupaśyet. yena ca dharmeṇa
S06adsp55-u:814_5: sarvavāsanānusandhiprahāṇaṃ kuryāt tam api na samanupaśyati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:814_6: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. sarvadharma anupalaṃbhayogena. yasmiṃ
S06adsp55-u:814_7: subhūte samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharma anupalabhamānaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati
S06adsp55-u:815: tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃ chokaśalyasamarpito bhavati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo mātāpitroḥ kālagatayo śokaśalyasamarpito bhavati. parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgataḥ,
S06adsp55-u:816_0: evam eva subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ
S06adsp55-u:816_1: sarvadharma anupalabhamānasya śokaśalyasamarpito bhavati. parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgataḥ. subhūtir āha:
S06adsp55-u:817: kim eka eva bhagavaṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃ parameṇa śokaśalyena samarpito bhavati. utāho ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātu mārā pāpiyāṃsas (AdSPG I 89)
S06adsp55-u:818: te sarve parameṇa śokaśalyena samarpitā bhavaṃti?
S06adsp55-u:820_0: ye 'pi te subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsas te sarve parameṇa
S06adsp55-u:820_1: śokaśalyena samanvāgatā bhavaṃti. svakasvakeṣu ca āsaneṣu na ramante. yadā bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:820_2: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahito bhavati. evaṃ viharato bodhisattvasya
S06adsp55-u:820_3: mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuro loko 'vatāraṃ na labhate gādhaṃ na labhate. yatra
S06adsp55-u:820_4: gṛhītvā vivartayet. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṣipram anuttarāṃ
S06adsp55-u:820_6: viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. evaṃ
S06adsp55-u:820_7: śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā. vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ
S06adsp55-u:820_8: gacchati. prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvapāramitā
S06adsp55-u:820_9: bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchaṃti. athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavaṃtam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:821: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati,
S06adsp55-u:822: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā. prajñāpāramitā kathaṃ bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati?
S06adsp55-u:824_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānaṃ dadan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs tad
S06adsp55-u:824_1: dānaṃ dadāti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ
S06adsp55-u:824_2: gacchati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā [f. 238a] bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati?
S06adsp55-u:825: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva śīlaṃ rakṣan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs tac chīlaṃ rakṣati. evaṃ (AdSPG I 90)
S06adsp55-u:826: khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati?
S06adsp55-u:827_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāṃtyā saṃpādayaṃ. sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. pariṇāmayaṃs
S06adsp55-u:827_1: tāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā
S06adsp55-u:827_2: bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā
S06adsp55-u:828_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ vīryam ārabhamāṇaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs
S06adsp55-u:828_1: tad vīryam ārabhate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā
S06adsp55-u:828_2: bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā
S06adsp55-u:829_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni samāpadyamānaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs
S06adsp55-u:829_1: tāni dhyānāni samāpadyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā
S06adsp55-u:829_2: bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā
S06adsp55-u:830_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāṃ bhāvayan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs
S06adsp55-u:830_1: tāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā
S06adsp55-u:830_2: bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. athāyuṣmāñc subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:831: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:833: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānan dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayataḥ sarvasattveṣu maitraṃ kāyakarma maitraṃ vākkarma maitraṃ (AdSPG I 91)
S06adsp55-u:834: manaskarma pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati. śīlapāramitāṃ tasmiṃ samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:835: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:837_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadataḥ yan te parigrāhakā ākrośaṃti
S06adsp55-u:837_1: vā paribhāṣanti vā asahyābhir vā paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samudācaraṃti sa na teṣām antike
S06adsp55-u:837_2: cittam āghātayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ
S06adsp55-u:838: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyaṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:840_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadataḥ yan te parigrāhakā akrośanti
S06adsp55-u:840_1: vā paribhāṣante vā asahyābhir vā paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samudācaraṃti tasyākruśyamānasya
S06adsp55-u:840_2: vā paribhāṣyamānasya vā asahyābhir vā paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samudācaryamāṇasya vā dānabuddhir
S06adsp55-u:840_3: eva bhavati parityāgabuddhir eva bhavati. dātavyam eva mayā
S06adsp55-u:841: dānaṃ na mayā dānaṃ na dātavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:842: sa kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ ca vīryaṃ saṃjanayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ [f. 238b] parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:843: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:845: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadan na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty,
S06adsp55-u:846: anyatra sarvākārajñātāyām eva asya cittaṃ na pravartate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo (AdSPG I 92)
S06adsp55-u:848: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo upāyakauśalena dānan dadan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:850_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadato dānaṃ parityajato māyābuddhir
S06adsp55-u:850_1: sadā dāne pratyupasthitā bhavati. tena ca dānena na kasyacid sattvasya upakāraṃ vā
S06adsp55-u:850_2: apakaraṃ vā paśyati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthita.
S06adsp55-u:854: kathaṃ bhagavān bodhisattvo mahāsattva śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:856_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito yaḥ kāyiko vā vāciko vā
S06adsp55-u:856_1: caitasiko vā saṃcaras tena saṃcareṇa śrāvakabhūmiṃ. vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā na
S06adsp55-u:856_2: parāmṛśati. sa tatra ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito na sattvān jīvitād vyavaropayati nādattam
S06adsp55-u:856_3: ādadāti. na kāmeṣu mithyācarati na mṛṣāvācaṃ bhāṣate. na piśunāṃ vācāṃ bhāṣate. na
S06adsp55-u:856_4: paruṣāṃ vācāṃ bhāṣate. na saṃbhinnapralāpī bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:857_0: na abhidhyālur bhavati na vyāpannacitto bhavati. na mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati. sa tatra
S06adsp55-u:857_1: śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito yad dānaṃ dadāty annam annārthakebhyaḥ pānaṃ pānārthakebhyo
S06adsp55-u:857_2: yānaṃ yānārthakebhyo vastraṃ vastrārthakebhyaḥ puṣpāṇi puṣpārthakebhyo mālyaṃ mālyārthakebhyo
S06adsp55-u:857_3: gandhān gandhārthakebhyo vilepanāṃ vilepanārthakebhyaḥ śayanāsanaṃ śayanāsanārthakebhyaḥ
S06adsp55-u:857_4: upāśrayam upāśrayārthakebhyaḥ prājīvikaṃ prājīvikārthakebhyaḥ upakaraṇam upakaranārthakebhyaḥ
S06adsp55-u:857_5: yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān pariṣkārān dadāti. tac ca dānaṃ sarvasattvai sārdhaṃ
S06adsp55-u:857_6: sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati. tathā ca pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp55-u:857_7: yathā pariṇāmo na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu
S06adsp55-u:859: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:861_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya sacet sarvasattvāgamyāṃgapratyaṅgāni
S06adsp55-u:861_1: cchittvā cchittvā gaccheyus tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ekacittotpādo 'pi
S06adsp55-u:861_2: na kṣubhyati na vyāpadyate anyatrāsyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:862_0: sulabdhā me lābhā yatra hi nāma mama sarvasattvā aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchittvā cchittvā
S06adsp55-u:862_1: gacchanti. anena ca ahaṃ kāyaparityāgena. divyaṃ vajramayaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ pratilapsye.
S06adsp55-u:862_2: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ
S06adsp55-u:863: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:865_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva kāyena ca cittena ca vīryaṃ na sraṃsayati. sarvasattvā
S06adsp55-u:865_1: mayā uttārayitavyā saṃsārād amṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:865_2: mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:866: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:868_0: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate. dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:868_1: caturthaṃ yāvan nirodhaṃ samāpadyate. na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmim
S06adsp55-u:868_2: adhyālambate. anyatrāsyaivaṃ bhavati. iha mayā samādhipāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG I 95)
S06adsp55-u:869: sthitvā sarvasattvā saṃsārāt parimocayitavyā iti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06adsp55-u:870: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:872_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlāpāramitāyāṃ sthito na kaṃcid dharmaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ
S06adsp55-u:872_1: paśyati na asaṃskṛtaṃ paśyati. na bhāvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ paśyati. na abhāvam asaṃskṛtaṃ
S06adsp55-u:872_2: paśyati. na nimittaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ paśyati. na animittam asaṃskṛtaṃ paśyati. na kasyacid
S06adsp55-u:872_3: dharmasya astitāṃ vā nāstitāṃ vā samanupaśyati. anyatra sarvadharmatathatāṃ na vyativartaṃte.
S06adsp55-u:872_4: tayā ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalena ca na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau
S06adsp55-u:872_5: vā patati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthita prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:873: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇātī?
S06adsp55-u:875_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānan dadato
S06adsp55-u:875_1: yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya sarvasattvā ākrośeyuḥ paribhāṣerann aṅgapratyaṅgāni vā
S06adsp55-u:875_2: cchintyuś tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:876_0: dātavyam eva mayaitebhya sattvebhya na mayā dānaṃ na dātavyaṃ. sa teṣāṃ sattvānām
S06adsp55-u:876_1: annam annārthikebhyo dadāti. pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo dadāti. yāvad anyatarānyatarān
S06adsp55-u:876_2: mānuṣyakāṃ pariṣkārāṃ dadāti. sa tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāṃ
S06adsp55-u:876_3: kṛtvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati. yathā pariṇāmayatas triṣu buddhiṣu (AdSPG I 96)
S06adsp55-u:877: na pravartate. kaḥ pariṇāmayati kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati. kva vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:878: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:880_0: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇa
S06adsp55-u:880_1: na kaṃcit sattvaṃ jīvitād vyavaropayati. nādattam ādadāti na kāmeṣu mithyācarati
S06adsp55-u:880_2: na mṛṣāvadati na paiśunyaṃ [f. 239b] vadati. na pāruṣyaṃ vadati. na saṃbhinnapralāpī
S06adsp55-u:880_3: bhavati. na abhidhyālur bhavati na vyāpannacitto bhavati na mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:880_4: na ca asya śrāvakabhūmau vā. pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā cittaṃ krāmati. tāni ca kuśalamūlāni
S06adsp55-u:880_5: sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp55-u:880_6: tathā ca pariṇāmayati. yathā trividhā buddhir na pravartate. kaḥ pariṇāmayati kiṃ
S06adsp55-u:880_7: vā pariṇāmayati. kva vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:881: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:883_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito evaṃ vīryaṃ saṃjanayati.
S06adsp55-u:883_1: gatvāhaṃ yojanaśataṃ vā gatvā yāvad yojanasahasraṃ vā yāvad yojanaśatasahasraṃ vā
S06adsp55-u:883_2: gatvā yāval lokadhātuṃ vā gatvā lokadhātukoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā gatvā tatra antataḥ
S06adsp55-u:883_3: ekasattvam api śaraṇagamane śikṣāpadeṣu vā pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ (AdSPG I 97)
S06adsp55-u:884_0: kṣāntau vā śrotaāpattiphale vā yāvad arhattve vā pratyekabodhau vā yāvad anuttarasyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:884_1: samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayeyam iti vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ
S06adsp55-u:884_2: sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte
S06adsp55-u:884_3: bodhisattvo mahāsattva kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:885: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:887_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito viviktam eva kāmair
S06adsp55-u:887_1: viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalaiḥ dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ
S06adsp55-u:887_2: dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06adsp55-u:888_0: yāvan nirodhaṃ samāpadya viharati. utpanno 'nutpannāṃś ca cittacaitasikān dharmān
S06adsp55-u:888_1: kuśalopasaṃhitān sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati. tathā ca pariṇāmayati. yathā dhyānāni
S06adsp55-u:888_2: ca dhyānāṅgāni ca tasmiṃ samaye nopalabhate. nevaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:889: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛḥṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:891: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣantipāramitāyāṃ sthito yasmiṃ samaye dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī viharati,
S06adsp55-u:892: viviktākāreṇa vā śāntākāreṇa vā akṣayākāreṇa vā,
S06adsp55-u:894: yāvan na bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇo bhavati. tatra ca niṣadya. sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. utthāya ca dharmacakraṃ pravartayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo (AdSPG I 98)
S06adsp55-u:895: mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. tathā ca parigṛhṇāti yathā notsṛjati. na parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:896: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo. vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ [f. 240a] parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:898: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kāyena ca cittena ca dhuraṃ na nikṣipati,
S06adsp55-u:899_0: avaśyam eva mayā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā. na mayā na abhisaṃboddhavyā
S06adsp55-u:899_1: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. sa sattvānāṃ kṛte yojanaṃ vā yāvad yojanaśataṃ vā yojanasahasraṃ
S06adsp55-u:899_2: vā yojanaśatasahasraṃ vā. lokadhātuṃ vā yāval lokadhātukoṭiṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīśataṃ
S06adsp55-u:899_3: vā lokadhātukoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā gatvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito 'ntaśa ekasattvam api
S06adsp55-u:899_4: bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati. saced bodhisattvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ na labheta tatra śravakayānikaṃ
S06adsp55-u:899_5: pudgalaṃ śrāvakatve pratiṣṭhāpayati. pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ pratyekabuddhatve
S06adsp55-u:899_6: pratiṣṭhāpayati. antaśa ekasattvam api daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp55-u:899_7: sa tad dharmadānaṃ dattvā āmiṣadānena sattvān saṃtarpayati. tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ na
S06adsp55-u:899_8: śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayati. anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ
S06adsp55-u:899_9: sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:899_10: mahāsattvo. vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:900: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:902_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇa
S06adsp55-u:902_1: ātmanā ca prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati. paraṃ ca prāṇātipātavairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayati.
S06adsp55-u:902_2: prāṇātipātavairamaṇyasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye ca anye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhavanti
S06adsp55-u:903: teṣām api ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. yāvad ātmanā ea mithyādṛṣṭeḥ (AdSPG I 99)
S06adsp55-u:904_0: prativirato bhavati paraṃ ca mithyādṛṣṭivairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayati. mithyādṛṣṭivairamaṇyasya
S06adsp55-u:904_1: ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye ca anye mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratās teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:904_2: samanujñaḥ. sa tayā śīlapāramitayā na kāmadhātau pratitiṣṭhati. na rūpadhātau na
S06adsp55-u:904_3: arūpyadhātau pratitiṣṭhati. na śrāvakabhūmau na pratyekabuddhabhūmau pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp55-u:904_4: nānyatra tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvai sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06adsp55-u:904_5: pariṇāmayati. tathā ca pariṇāmayati. yathā asya trividhā buddhir na pravartate. kaḥ
S06adsp55-u:904_6: pariṇāmayati kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati. kva vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:904_7: mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:905: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:907_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya
S06adsp55-u:907_1: sacet manuṣyabhūto vā amanuṣyabhūto vā cittavikṣepaṃ kuryāt aṅgapratyaṅgāni vā chittvā
S06adsp55-u:907_2: cchitvā ādāya gacchet tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyaṃ sthitasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:908: kaścit me chinnatti vā bhinnatti vā harati vā. api tv asyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:909_0: sulabdhā [f. 240b] me lābhā yeṣām eva kṛte kāyaṃ pariharāmi. ta evāgamya mamāṅgapratyaṅgāni
S06adsp55-u:909_1: chittvā chittvā ādāya gacchanti. dharmāṇāṃ vā tena prakṛtiḥ sumanasikṛtā bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:909_2: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty anyatra
S06adsp55-u:909_3: sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādharaṇāni kṛtvānuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp55-u:910: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthita kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:911: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:913_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair
S06adsp55-u:913_1: dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pritisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
S06adsp55-u:913_2: viharati. yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa maitrīsahagatena cittena
S06adsp55-u:913_3: yāvat sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati. evaṃ karuṇāsahagatena muditāsahagatena
S06adsp55-u:913_4: upekṣāsahagatena cittena yāvat sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp55-u:913_5: yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati. sa teṣāṃ dhyānānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:913_6: ca apramāṇānāṃ ca ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ. vipākaṃ na parigṛhṇāti. anyatra yatra sarvasattvānām
S06adsp55-u:913_7: arthaḥ kartavyas tatropapadyate. sa tān sattvān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu paripācayati. dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:914_0: buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsīnaḥ kuśalamūlānām
S06adsp55-u:914_1: avaropanatāyai. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito
S06adsp55-u:915: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:917_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ na dravyataḥ
S06adsp55-u:917_1: samanupaśyati. na bhāvato na nimittataḥ. śīlapāramitāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati.
S06adsp55-u:918: kṣāntipāramitāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
S06adsp55-u:921_0: dhyānapāramitāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ. evaṃ yāvat smṛtyupasthānāni
S06adsp55-u:921_1: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati. na bhāvato na nimittataḥ. sa sarvadharmān
S06adsp55-u:922: na kaścid dharme niketaṃ karoti. sa yathāvādi tathākārī bhavati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:923: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:925_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akusalair
S06adsp55-u:925_1: dharmai savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp55-u:925_2: yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati. sa tatra dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:926_0: 241a] tebhya sattvebhya āmiṣadānaṃ ca dharmadānaṃ ca dadāti. sa ātmanā ca āmiṣadānaṃ
S06adsp55-u:926_1: ca dharmadānaṃ ca dadāti. parāṃś ca āmiṣadānena ca dharmadānena ca samādāpayati.
S06adsp55-u:926_2: āmiṣadānadharmadānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye ca anye sattvā āmiṣadānaṃ ca dharmadānaṃ
S06adsp55-u:926_3: ca dadanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvākabhūmau
S06adsp55-u:926_4: vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty anyatra sarvasattvai sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni
S06adsp55-u:926_5: kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06adsp55-u:927: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthita śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:929: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya na rāgasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate na doṣasahagataṃ na mohasahagataṃ,
S06adsp55-u:930: na vihiṃsā sahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. (AdSPG I 102)
S06adsp55-u:932_0: tāni ca kuśalamūlaṃ na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty anyatra
S06adsp55-u:932_1: sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp55-u:932_2: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:933: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:935_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ phenapiṇḍopamaṃ rūpaṃ
S06adsp55-u:935_1: pratyavekṣate. budbudopamāṃ vedanām marīcyupamāṃ saṃjñāṃ kadalyupamāṃ saṃskārān māyopamaṃ
S06adsp55-u:935_2: vijñānaṃ pratyavekṣate. tasyaivaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasya pañcasu upādānaskandheṣv asārakasaṃjña
S06adsp55-u:935_3: pratyupasthitā bhavati. tasyaivaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasyaivam bhavati. cchidyamāneṣv aṅgapratyaṅgeṣu
S06adsp55-u:935_4: ko 'tra chinnanti kiṃ veha cchidyate. kasya vā kāyaḥ kasya vā vedanā kasyeyaṃ saṃjñā
S06adsp55-u:935_5: kasya vā saṃskārā kasya vā vijñānaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:936: tasyaivaṃ pratyevekṣamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati. ko 'trākruśyate vā paribhāṣyate vā yatra ākruśyamānasya vā paribhāṣyamāṇasya vā vyāpāda utpadyate?
S06adsp55-u:937: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:938: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:940_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā viviktam eva kāmair
S06adsp55-u:940_1: viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalaiḥ dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānam (AdSPG I 103)
S06adsp55-u:941_0: upasaṃpadya viharati. yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa dhyānānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:941_1: dhyānāṅgānāṃ ca nimittam udgṛhya anekavidham ṛddhividhiṃ pratyanubhavati. yāvad vistareṇa kartavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:942: yāvad divyena śrotradhātunā ubhayāṃc chabdāṃc chṛṇoti. divyāṃś ca mānuṣāṃś ca,
S06adsp55-u:943_0: parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yāvad anuttaraṃ
S06adsp55-u:943_1: cittam anuttaraṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. so 'nekavidhaṃ pūrve nivāsam anusmarati.
S06adsp55-u:943_2: yāvad vistareṇa kartavyaṃ. yāvat sa divyena cakṣuṣā atikrāntamānuṣeṇa yāvad,
S06adsp55-u:944_0: yathākarmopagān sattvān paśyati. sa imāḥ [f. 241b] pañcābhijñā. pratiṣṭhāya buddhakṣetrād
S06adsp55-u:944_1: buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati. buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsīnaḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropayan
S06adsp55-u:944_2: sattvān paripāvayan buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayaṃs. tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakabhūmau
S06adsp55-u:944_3: vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādharaṇaṃ
S06adsp55-u:944_4: kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06adsp55-u:945: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:947_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito rūpaṃ nopalabhate. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ
S06adsp55-u:947_1: nopalabhate. dānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
S06adsp55-u:947_2: dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nopalabhate. smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhate samyakprahāṇāni
S06adsp55-u:947_3: nopalabhate. ṛddhipādāṃ nopalabhate indriyāṇi nopalabhate balāni nopalabhate. bodhyaṃgāni
S06adsp55-u:949_0: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nopalabhate. saṃskṛtadhātuṃ nopalabhate asaṃskṛtadhātuṃ nopalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:949_1: anupalabhamāno na abhisaṃskaroti. anabhisaṃskurvan notpādayati. na nirodhayati. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:950_0: tathā hi subhūte utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣāṃ
S06adsp55-u:950_1: dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā sthita eva dharmadhātu sa naivotpadyate na nirudhyate. so
S06adsp55-u:950_3: khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:951: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:953: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sarvadharmāṃc chūnyā iti
S06adsp55-u:955: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmāṃc chūnyā iti samanupaśyati?
S06adsp55-u:957_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ carann
S06adsp55-u:957_3: śūnyatāśūnyateti nopalabhate. mahāśūnyatāṃ mahāśūnyateti nopalabhate. paramārthaśūnyatāṃ
S06adsp55-u:957_7: avakāraśūnyateti nopalabhate. prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ prakṛtiśūnyateti nopalabhate sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ
S06adsp55-u:959_0: nopalabhate. sa iha caturdaśasu śūnyatāsu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpaṃ nopalabhate
S06adsp55-u:959_1: [f. 242a] śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam iti vā. vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nopalabhate.
S06adsp55-u:959_2: śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam iti vā. smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhate śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam
S06adsp55-u:959_3: iti vā. yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikāṃ buddhadharmāṃ nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā.
S06adsp55-u:959_4: yāvad bodhim api nopalabhate śūnyeti vā aśūnyeti vā. saṃskṛtadhātuṃ nopalabhate śūnya
S06adsp55-u:959_5: iti vā aśūnya iti vā. asaṃskṛtadhātuṃ nopalabhate śūnya iti vā aśūnya iti vā. sa
S06adsp55-u:959_6: iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yad yad eva dānaṃ dadāty annaṃ
S06adsp55-u:959_7: vā pānaṃ vā yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakāṃ pariṣkarāṃs tad dānaṃ śūnyam iti na
S06adsp55-u:959_8: samanupaśyati. yo vā dadāti. yasmai vā dadāti tam api śūnyam iti na samanupaśyati.
S06adsp55-u:959_9: tasya mātsaryacittasya vā āgrahacittasya vā avakāśo na bhavati. tat kasya heto?
S06adsp55-u:960_0: sarva ete prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vikalpāna bhavaṃti.
S06adsp55-u:960_1: prathamacittotpādam upādāya. yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya. yathaiva tathāgatasya arhata
S06adsp55-u:960_2: samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya na mātsaryacittaṃ vā
S06adsp55-u:961_0: tathaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na mātsaryacittaṃ
S06adsp55-u:961_1: vā āgrahacittaṃ vā utpadyate. eṣa eva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śāstā yaduta prajñāpāramitā.
S06adsp55-u:961_2: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:962: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:964: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ (AdSPG I 106)
S06adsp55-u:965: śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittānām avakāśaṃ na dadāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:966_0: tathā hi sa śrāvākapratyekabuddhabhūmīṃ nopalabhate. tac ca cittaṃ nopalabhate. yac
S06adsp55-u:966_1: chrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayet. sa prathamacittotpādam upādaya.
S06adsp55-u:966_2: yāvad bodhimaṇḍaṃ prāṇātipātaṃ prahāṇāya dharman deśayati. ātmanā ca prāṇātipātāt
S06adsp55-u:966_3: prativirato bhavati. paraṃ ca prāṇātipātavairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayati. prāṇātipātavairamaṇyasya
S06adsp55-u:966_4: ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye ca anye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhavaṃti teṣām api varṇavādī
S06adsp55-u:966_5: bhavati. samanujñaḥ. yāvad ātmanā ca mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativirato bhavati. paraṃ ca mityādṛṣṭivairamaṇye
S06adsp55-u:966_6: samādāpayati mithyādṛṣṭivairamaṇyasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye ca anye mithyādṛṣṭiviratās
S06adsp55-u:966_7: teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. tena ca śīlena na kaṃcid dharmaṃ parāmṛśati.
S06adsp55-u:966_8: śrāvakatvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhatvaṃ vā buddhatvaṃ vā prāg eva anye kecit. evaṃ khalu
S06adsp55-u:966_9: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāni parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:967: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:969_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitasya ānulomikī kṣāntir
S06adsp55-u:969_1: utpadyate. tasyaivaṃ bhavati. neha kaścid dharma utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā. jāyate
S06adsp55-u:971_0: cchidyate vā bhidyate vā. [f. 242b] hanyate vā. tasya prathamacittopādam upādāya
S06adsp55-u:971_1: yāvad bodhimaṇḍam atrāntarāt sacet sarvasattvā āgamya ākrośeyu paribhāṣeral loṣṭadaṇḍa
S06adsp55-u:971_2: muṣṭiśastraprahārān dadyuś cchindyur bhidyur vā tatrāsyaivaṃ bhavati. aho dharmāṇāṃ

S06adsp55-u:972_1: hanyate vā badhyate vā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:973: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:975: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām sthitaḥ caturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu
S06adsp55-u:976_0: sthita upāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ ca vīryaṃ saṃjanayya lokadhātum

S06adsp55-u:976_2: api gatvā sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati. dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:976_3: vā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vā vīryapāramitāyāṃ vā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ

S06adsp55-u:976_5: pratiṣṭhāpayati. sakṛdāgāmīphale anāgāmīphale arhattve pratyekabodhau yāvad anuttarasyāṃ

S06adsp55-u:976_7: pratiṣṭhāpayati. na asaṃskṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:976_8: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:977: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp55-u:979_0: iha subhūte hodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathāgatasamādhiṃ sthāpayitvā

S06adsp55-u:979_2: vā tān sarvān samāpadyate. tatra samādhiṣu sthitvā aṣṭau vimokṣān anulomapratilomaṃ
S06adsp55-u:979_3: samāpadyate ca vyutthiṣṭhate ca. katamān aṣṭau?
S06adsp55-u:980: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpī rūpāṇi paśyaty,
S06adsp55-u:981: ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ. adhyātmarūpasaṃjñī bahirddhārūpāṇi paśyaty, ayaṃ (AdSPG I 108)
S06adsp55-u:983: ayaṃ tritīyo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānāntyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06adsp55-u:984: ayaṃ caturtho vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśa ākāśānāntyāyatana samatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānanantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06adsp55-u:985: ayaṃ paṃcamo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramān nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06adsp55-u:986: ayaṃ ṣaṣṭho vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanasamatikramān naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06adsp55-u:987: ayaṃ saptamo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamatikramāt saṃjñāvedayitanirodham [f. 243a] upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06adsp55-u:988_0: ayam aṣṭamo vimokṣaḥ. imān aṣṭau vimokṣān anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyutthiṣṭhate
S06adsp55-u:988_1: ca. nava ca anupūrvasamāpattīr anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyutthiṣṭhate ca. katamā nava?
S06adsp55-u:989_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair

S06adsp55-u:989_3: saṃjñāvedayitanirodham upasaṃpadya viharati. iha nava anupūrvasamāpattīr anulomapratilomaṃ

S06adsp55-u:989_5: vibhaṅgaṃ kṛtvā imaṃ siṃhavijṛṃbhitaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate. katamaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasya
S06adsp55-u:991_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair
