S06adsp55-u:994_9: tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate. tṛtīyadhyānād vyutthāya asamahitacitte 'vatiṣṭhate.
S06adsp55-u:994_10: asamahitacittād dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate. dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthāya asamahitacitte
S06adsp55-u:994_11: 'vatiṣṭhate. asamahitacittāt prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate. prathamadhyānād vyutthāya
S06adsp55-u:994_12: asamahitacitte 'vatiṣṭhate. sa iha avaskandakasamādhau sthitvā sarvadharmasamatām
S06adsp55-u:994_13: anuprāpnoti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito
S06adsp55-u:997: atha khalv āyuṣman subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:998: kiyac ciraṃ saṃprasthito vatāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1000: asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīniyutasaṃprasthito 'yaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1001: kiyanto buddhān bhagavantaḥ paryupāsito 'yaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1003: gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān bhagavantaḥ paryupāsito sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1004: kin tena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuśalamūlam avaropitama yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1006_0: prathamacittotpādam upādāya subhūte na sā kācid dānapāramitā yā tena bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1006_1: mahāsattvena na paripūritā yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ. na sā kācic chīlapāramitā
S06adsp55-u:1006_2: kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā yā tena bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1006_3: mahāsattvena na paripūritā yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1007: āścaryam etad bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgatāḥ. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1008: evam etat subhūte evam etat. āścaryam etad bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgatāḥ tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sūryacandramaṇḍalaṃ caturo (AdSPG I 112)
S06adsp55-u:1011: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā pañcasu pāramitāsu karma karoti,
S06adsp55-u:1012: pañcapāramitā anugacchaty anuparivartate. prajñāpāramitā avirahitatvāt pañcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante,
S06adsp55-u:1013: prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvān na pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yathā rājā cakravartī virahitaḥ saptabhī ratnair na rājā cakravartīti nāmadheyaṃ labhate,
S06adsp55-u:1014: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitā prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvān na pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte apuruṣā strī sudharṣaṇā bhavati dhūrtakaiḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1015_0: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvāt pañcapāramitāḥ sudharṣaṇā bhavanti māreṇa
S06adsp55-u:1015_1: vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhiḥ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte saṃgrāmāvacaraḥ puruṣaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1015_2: sarvasannāhasannaddhaḥ saṃgrāme vartamāne durādharṣo bhavati pratirājānair vā pratyarthikair
S06adsp55-u:1016: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitā avirahitatvād durādharṣā bhavanti māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir,
S06adsp55-u:1018: yāvan bodhisattvacaṇḍālair vā. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte koṭṭarājāno rājñā cakravartinā anuvidheyā bhavanti,
S06adsp55-u:1020_0: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā yena sarvākārajñatā tena
S06adsp55-u:1020_1: anugacchanti. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāḥ kācit kunadyaḥ sarvās tā yena gaṅgānadī
S06adsp55-u:1022: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītāḥ yena sarvākārajñatā tena anugacchanti. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya dakṣiṇahastaḥ sarvakṛtyāṇi karoty,
S06adsp55-u:1023_0: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā draṣṭavyā. yathā vāmahastaḥ evaṃ pañcapāramitā draṣṭavyā.
S06adsp55-u:1023_1: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yat kunadīṣu yac ca mahānadīṣu udakaṃ sarvaṃ tan mahāsamudram
S06adsp55-u:1024_0: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītāḥ sarvākārajñatām anupraviṣṭā
S06adsp55-u:1024_1: pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñāś cakravartinaś caturaṅgasya
S06adsp55-u:1025: tiṣṭhati ca. yatra rājā cakravarty annahetos tiṣṭhati,
S06adsp55-u:1027: na ca tac cakraratnaṃ sthānataś calati,
S06adsp55-u:1028: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pariṇāyikā,
S06adsp55-u:1032_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś tac cakraratnaṃ tac ca pariṇāyakaratnaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1032_1: tac ca gṛhapatiratnaṃ tac ca strīratnaṃ tac ca maṇiratnaṃ tac ca hastiratnaṃ tac
S06adsp55-u:1032_2: ca aśvaratnaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasya agrato gacchaty,
S06adsp55-u:1033: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā agrato gacchaty,
S06adsp55-u:1034: agrato gatvā yena sarvākārajñatā tena tiṣṭhati,
S06adsp55-u:1036: dānapāramitā mama [f. 243b] anugacchet. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā anugacchet. na dānapāramitāyā evaṃ bhavaty:
S06adsp55-u:1037: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitām anugaccheyaṃ. evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryaparamitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā (AdSPG I 114)
S06adsp55-u:1039: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitām anugaccheyaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1040: svabhāvo hy āsām eṣaḥ akiṃcitsamarthaḥ svabhāvaśūnyā tucchā marīcisamā. athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:1042_0: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carañc chīlapāramitāyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1042_1: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anuttarāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1044: iha subhūte bodisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭpāramitāsu carataḥ evaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:1045_0: viparyastacitto vatāyaṃ lokasanniveśaḥ. sa na śakyam anupāyakauśalena saṃsārāt parimocayituṃ.
S06adsp55-u:1045_1: ahaṃ teṣāṃ sattvānām arthāya dānapāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi. śīlapāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi
S06adsp55-u:1045_2: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi. vīryapāramitāyāṃ carisyāmi. dhyānapāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi.
S06adsp55-u:1045_3: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi. sa teṣāṃ sattvānām arthāya ādhyatmikabahyāni vastūni parityajati,
S06adsp55-u:1049_0: tathā hy etad vastu svabhāvaśūnyaṃ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva upaparīkṣamāṇo
S06adsp55-u:1049_1: dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati. teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya dauḥśīlasya avakāśaṃ na dadāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1051_0: naitad me pratirūpaṃ syād yad aham anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1051_1: kuryāṃ yāvan mithyādṛṣṭiko bhaveyaṃ viṣayān vā prārthayeyaṃ. devatvaṃ vā brahmatvaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1051_2: vā śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā prārthayeyaṃ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo (AdSPG I 115)
S06adsp55-u:1052_0: mahāsattvaḥ upaparīkṣamāṇaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati. teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya satatam
S06adsp55-u:1052_1: ākruśyamānaḥ paribhāṣyamāṇaḥ kaṭukaiḥ karkaśair vacanair na kṣobhacittam utpādayati.
S06adsp55-u:1052_2: nāpi loṣṭadaṇḍaśastrapāṣāṇaprahārais tāḍyamāno nāpi śārirā vayaveṣu bhidyamāneṣu
S06adsp55-u:1052_3: nāpy aṅgapratyaṅgāvayaveṣu cchidyamāneṣu duṣṭacittam utpādayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1053_0: tathā hi sa sarvaśaṃ tāṃ pratiśrutkropamān upaparīkṣate. rūpaṃ phenapiṇḍopamaṃ yāvat
S06adsp55-u:1053_1: vijñānaṃ māyopamam upaparīkṣate. [f. 244a] evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S06adsp55-u:1054: teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya na kausīdyacittam utpādayati. sarvakuśalaparyeṣṭyāṃ yāvan na anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1056_0: na kusīdena śakyaṃ sattvānām arthaḥ kartum anuttarāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ.
S06adsp55-u:1056_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva upaparīkṣamāṇaḥ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:1056_2: teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya na vikṣiptacitto bhavati yāvan na anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06adsp55-u:1056_3: abhisaṃbuddho bhavati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ upaparīkṣamāṇo
S06adsp55-u:1056_4: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati. teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya na jātu prajñāvirahito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1057: nāpy anyathā śakyaṃ sattvān paripācayitum anyatra prajñāpāramitāpraveśāt,
S06adsp55-u:1059: cittaṃ notpādayitavyam iti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām evārthāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1061: kutaḥ iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agryā ākhyāyate jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītā anuttarā niruttarā asamasamā ākhyāyate. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1063: na subhūte pāramitānāṃ kiṃcin nānātvāṃ. yadi punaḥ prajñāpāramitā na bhaven nemāḥ paṃcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labheran,
S06adsp55-u:1064: prajñāpāramitāṃ punar āgamya imāḥ paṃcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nānāprakārā ātmabhāvāḥ sumeruṃ parvatarājam upasaṃkrāntā ekavarṇā bhavanti,
S06adsp55-u:1065: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitām āgamyemāḥ paṃcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante tāḥ sarvākārajñatām anupraviṣṭā ekavarṇā bhavanti. yaduta prajñāpāramitāvarṇā,
S06adsp55-u:1066: na viśeṣaḥ kaścit prajñāyate iyan dānapāramitā iyaṃ śīlapāramitā iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā iyaṃ vīryapāramitā iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:1068: anena kāraṇena viśeso na prajñāyate. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1069: yadi bhagavaṃ nārthaprāptau kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate,
S06adsp55-u:1070_0: kuta iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā āsāṃ paṃcānāṃ pāramitānām agryākhyāyate. jyeṣṭhākhyāyate
S06adsp55-u:1070_1: śreṣṭhākhyāyate varā pravarā praṇītā ākhyāyate. anuttarā niruttarā asamasamā ākhyāyate. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1071: evam etat subhūte evam etat. nārthaprāptau kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate,
S06adsp55-u:1072: api tu khalu lokavyavahārasaṃketam upādāya dānapāramitā prajñāyate śīlapāramitā (AdSPG I 117)
S06adsp55-u:1073_0: kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā prajñāyate. sattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1073_1: saṃsārata parimocanatayā. sarve te ca sattvā na jāyaṃte na mṛyaṃte na cyavyaṃte nopapadyante.
S06adsp55-u:1073_2: sattvāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā. anena subhūte paryāyeṇa āsāṃ paṃcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1073_5: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yā kāścana striyas tāṣāṃ striratnānām agramā ākhyāyate yāvad
S06adsp55-u:1073_6: asamasamākhyāyate. evam eva subhūte āsāṃ paṃcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā agryākhyāyate
S06adsp55-u:1074: ka eṣa bhagavann abhiprāyo yat prajñāpāramitā agryā ākhyāyate yāvad asamasamākhyāyate?
S06adsp55-u:1076: tathā hi iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvakuśaladharmān parigṛhya yena sarvākārajñatā tena sthāsyaty asthānayogena. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1077: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā kaṃcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muṃcati vā?
S06adsp55-u:1079: no hīdaṃ subhūte na prajñāpāramitā kaṃcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muṃcati vā. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:1080: tathā hi subhūte. te sarvadharmā agṛhītā amuktāḥ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1081: katamān bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṃ na gṛhṇāti na muṃcati?
S06adsp55-u:1083: rūpaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati. vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati,
S06adsp55-u:1084: yāvad bodhiṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1090: rūpasya subhūte amanasikārato rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:1091: vedanāyā saṃjñāyā saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya amanasikārato vijñānam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:1092: yāvat sarvākārajñatāyā amanasikārato bodhir aparigṛhītā bhavati. evaṃ khalu subhūte rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati. yāvad bodhir aparigṛhītā bhavati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1093: yadi bhagavaṃ rūpaṃ na manasikartavyaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ na manasikartavyaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā na manasikartavyā,
S06adsp55-u:1094: tat kathaṃ bhagavann amanasikurvato rūpaṃ yāvad amanasikurvataḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ kuśalamūlāni vivardhante,
S06adsp55-u:1096: ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir aparipūryamāṇābhiḥ kathaṃ sarvākārajñatā anuprāpsyate?
S06adsp55-u:1098: yadā subhūte rūpaṃ na manasikariṣyati vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ na manasikariṣyati,
S06adsp55-u:1099: yāvad bodhiṃ na manasikariṣyati tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlaṃ vivardhiṣyante,
S06adsp55-u:1100: kuśalamūlair vivardhamānai ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrayiṣyati ṣaṭpāramitā paripūrya sarvākārajñām anuprāpsyati. tat kasya heto?
S06adsp55-u:1101: amanasikṛtya rūpam amanasikṛtya vedanāṃ saṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānam amanasikṛtya bodhim anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1102: kim atra bhagavaṃ kāraṇāṃ yad amanasikṛtya rūpaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1103: amanasikṛtya vedanāṃ saṃjñā saṃskāravijñānaṃ amanasikṛtya bodhiṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06adsp55-u:1106_0: kāmadhātau na ślesyate rūpadhātau na śleṣyate arūpyadhātau amanasikāreṇa na kvacic
S06adsp55-u:1106_1: cchliṣyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na (AdSPG I 119)
S06adsp55-u:1108: evañ caran bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo [f. 245a] mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kva sthāsyati?
S06adsp55-u:1110: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na sthāsyati vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne na sthāsyati. yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na sthāsyati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1111: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃs tatra api sarvākārajñātāyān na sthāsyati?
S06adsp55-u:1113: anabhiniveśena na kvacit sthāsyati. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:1114_0: tathā hi sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati yatra abhiniviśed avatiṣṭhed vā. evaṃ khalu
S06adsp55-u:1114_1: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajnāpāramitāyāṃ caraty anabhiniveśena asthānayogena.
S06adsp55-u:1115: ya evaṃ carati evaṃ bhāvayati sa prajñāpārmitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:1116_0: sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati. ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1116_1: bhāvayāmi. saced evaṃ saṃjānāti dūrikaroti prajñāpāramitāṃ. sa prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
S06adsp55-u:1117: vīryapāramitāyā kṣāntipāramitāyā śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā dūrībhavati. yāvat sarvākārajñatāyā dūrībhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1118: na hi prajñāpāramitā kaṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate. na hi prajñāpāramitāyā kaścid abhiniveśa. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:1119_0: tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti yatra abhiniviśeta. sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1119_1: mahāsattva prajñāpāramitām api saṃjānāti cyavate bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1119_2: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāś cyavate sa sarvadharmebhyaś cyavate. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati
S06adsp55-u:1121: cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā. na khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihīnena śakyam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:1122_0: iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthita vyākariṣyate 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cyuto bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1122_1: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. na hi prajñāpāramitāyāś cyuto vyākriyate 'nuttarasyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1123: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitām abhinirharati yāvat mahākaruṇām abhinirharati. cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā. tat kasya heto?
S06adsp55-u:1124: na hi prajñāpāramitāyāś cyutasya śakyaṃ dānapāramitām abhinirhartuṃ yāvan na śakyaṃ mahākaruṇām abhinirhartuṃ. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06adsp55-u:1125: parigṛhītās tathāgatena sarvadharmā svayam abhisaṃbudhya ākhyātā. deśitā prakāśitā cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1128: tathā hi subhūte tathāgata na kaṃcid dharmaṃ prajñapayati. kutaḥ puna kiṃcid dharmam abhisaṃbhotsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. atha khalv āyuṣmāṃs subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:1129: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ime doṣāḥ na bhavanti?
S06adsp55-u:1131: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ saṃjānāty asaṃtaḥ sarvadharmā aparigṛhītā aśakyam abhisaṃboddhuṃ. saced (AdSPG I 121)
S06adsp55-u:1132: evaṃ carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. sacet punar evam aparigṛhītaṃ dharmam abhiniviśate,
S06adsp55-u:1133: virahito bodhisattvo [f. 245b] mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1134: na hi prajñāpāramitā abhiniveśato vaktavyā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1135: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāyā avirahitā yāvad dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā avirahitā yāvat sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā avirahitā?
S06adsp55-u:1136_0: sacet prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitā. yāvad dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā
S06adsp55-u:1136_1: avirahitā yāvat sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā avirahitā. kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā
S06adsp55-u:1138: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam iti na abhiniviśate idaṃ rūpam asya rūpam iti. evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam iti na abhiniviśate,
S06adsp55-u:1140_0: yāvat sarvākārajñateti na abhiniviśate idaṃ sarvākārajñatā asya sarvākārajñateti.
S06adsp55-u:1140_1: rūpaṃ nityato vā anityato vā na abhiniviśate. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ nityato
S06adsp55-u:1140_2: vā anityato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nityato vā anityato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:1140_3: rūpaṃ sukhato vā duḥkhato vā nābhiniviśate. vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ sukhato
S06adsp55-u:1140_4: vā duḥkhato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ sukhato vā duḥkhato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:1140_5: rūpam ātmato vā anātmato vā nābhiniviśate,
S06adsp55-u:1141_0: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam ātmato vā anātmato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajñatām
S06adsp55-u:1141_1: ātmato vā anātmato vā nābhiniviśate. rūpaṃ śāntato vā aśāntato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:1141_2: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ śāntato vā aśāntato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajnatāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1141_3: śāntato vā aśāntato vā nābhiniviśate. rūpaṃ śūnyato vā aśūnyato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:1141_4: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ śūnyato vā aśūnyato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ (AdSPG I 122)
S06adsp55-u:1142_0: śūnyato vā aśūnyato vā nābhiniviśate. rūpaṃ nimittato vā animittato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:1142_1: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nimittato vā animittato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat
S06adsp55-u:1142_2: sarvākārajñatāṃ nimittato vā animittato vā nābhiniviśate. rūpaṃ praṇihitato vā apraṇihitato
S06adsp55-u:1142_3: vā nābhiniviśate. vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ praṇihitato vā apraṇihitato
S06adsp55-u:1142_4: vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ praṇihitato vā apraṇihitato vā nābhiniviśate.
S06adsp55-u:1142_5: rūpaṃ viviktato vā aviviktato vā nābhiniviśate,
S06adsp55-u:1143: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ viviktato vā aviviktato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ viviktato vā aviviktato vā nābhiniviśate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1144_0: na hy asvabhāvo dharmo nitya iti vā anitya iti vā sukham iti vā duḥkham iti va ātma
S06adsp55-u:1144_1: iti vā anātma iti vā śānta iti vā aśānta iti vā śūnya iti vā aśūnya iti vā nimittam
S06adsp55-u:1144_2: iti vā animittam iti vā praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā vivikta iti vā avivikta
S06adsp55-u:1144_3: iti vā śakyam abhinirhartuṃ. svabhāvaṃ svabhāvena śūnyam iti na śakyam abhinirhartuṃ.
S06adsp55-u:1144_4: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1145_0: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1145_1: dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāyāṃ [f. 246a] sthāsyati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte
S06adsp55-u:1145_2: rājñaś cakravartinaś caturaṃgo balakāyo. yena yena rājā cakravartī gacchati. tena
S06adsp55-u:1145_3: tena caturaṃgo balakāyo gacchati. evam eva subhūte yena yenaiva prajñāpāramitā gacchati.
S06adsp55-u:1145_4: tena tenemā pañcapāramitā anuvartante. yena sarvākārajñatā tena sthāsyanti. tadyathāpi
S06adsp55-u:1146: ca ratham abhiruhya samena mārgeṇa gacchati. evam eva āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā sārathī. samena mārgeṇa yena sarvākārajñatā tena gacchati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1147: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgaḥ katamaḥ amārgaḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1151: sarvākārajñatāmārgaḥ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgaḥ. ayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgaḥ ayam amārgaḥ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1152: mahākṛtyena bhagavan prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratyupasthitā yaivaṃ praṇayaty ayaṃ mārgo 'yam amārgaḥ. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1153_0: evam etat subhūte evam etat. mahākṛtyena prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā bodhisattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1153_1: mahāsattvānāṃ yā mārgaṃ vā amārgaṃ vā pradarśayati. aprameyakṛtyena prajñāpāramitā
S06adsp55-u:1153_2: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratyupasthitā. asaṃkhyeyakṛtyena prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1153_3: mahāsattvānāṃ pratyupasthitā. prajñāparamitā subhūte tac ca kṛtyam varṇayati. na
S06adsp55-u:1153_4: ca rūpaṃ parigṛhṇāti. na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ parigṛhṇāti
S06adsp55-u:1153_5: na śrāvakatvasya na pratyekabuddhatvasya parigrahāya pratyupasthitā. sā khalu punar
S06adsp55-u:1153_6: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāyikā anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ
S06adsp55-u:1155: sarvākārajñatāyāś ca upanāyikā evam iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasya utpādayitrī na nirodhayitrī dharmasthititāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1156: yadi bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasya utpādayitrī na nirodhayitrī,
S06adsp55-u:1157_0: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dānaṃ dātavyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1157_1: kathaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ kathaṃ kṣāntir bhāvayitavyāḥ kathaṃ vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ kathaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1159_0: sarvākārajñatām āraṃbaṇīkṛtya dānan dātavyāṃ sarvākārajñatām āraṃbaṇīkṛtya sīlaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1159_1: rakṣitavyaṃ sarvākārajñatām āraṃbanīkṛtya kṣāntir bhāvayitavyā sarvākārajñatām āraṃbaṇīkṛtya
S06adsp55-u:1159_2: vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ sarvākārajñatām āraṃbaṇīkṛtya dhyānāni samāpattavyāni. sarvākārajñatām
S06adsp55-u:1159_3: āraṃbaṇīkṛtya prajñā bhāvayitavyā. tena tāni kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni
S06adsp55-u:1159_4: kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni. evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06adsp55-u:1159_5: tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayataḥ ṣaṭpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ
S06adsp55-u:1159_6: gacchaṃti yāvad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvākārajñatā [f. 246b] bhāvanāparipūriṃ
S06adsp55-u:1159_7: gacchati. yaś ca kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir avirahitaḥ sa
S06adsp55-u:1159_8: sarvākārajñatāya avirahitaḥ. tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06adsp55-u:1159_9: abhisaṃboddhukāmena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitavyaṃ. ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1159_10: mahāsattvo sarvakuśalamūlāni paripūrya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tasmāt tarhi
S06adsp55-u:1159_11: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1160: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu (AdSPG I 125)
S06adsp55-u:1163_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ. rūpaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1163_1: na visaṃyuktaṃ. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāra vijñānaṃ sa saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā
S06adsp55-u:1163_2: na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
S06adsp55-u:1163_3: yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpe sthāsyāmi iti yoga karaṇīyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1164: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthāsyāmi iti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1165: yāvan na sarvākārajñatā yāṃ sthāsyāmi iti yoga karaṇīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1167: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ kvacit sthitaṃ. yāvan na sarvākārajñatā kvacit sthitā,
S06adsp55-u:1168_0: evam asthānayogena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarā samyakambodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā.
S06adsp55-u:1168_1: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa āmraphalāni vā panasaphalāni vā khāditukāmo bhavet.
S06adsp55-u:1168_2: tena āmraphalaṃ vā panasaphalaṃ vā avaropitavyaṃ. avaropya kālena kālam udakaṃ dātavyaṃ kelayitavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1169_0: tasya anupūrveṇa vardhamāne staṃbhe sāmagrīm āsādya āmraphalair vā panasaphalair
S06adsp55-u:1169_1: vā sāmagrī bhaviṣyati. sa tāny āmraphalāni vā panasaphalāni vā khādiṣyati. evam eva
S06adsp55-u:1169_2: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena
S06adsp55-u:1169_3: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā sattvān dānena anugrahītavyā śīlena kṣāntyā vīryeṇa dhyānena
S06adsp55-u:1169_4: prajñayā anugrahītavyāḥ sattvāṃ saṃsārāt parimocayitavyāḥ. tasmāt tarhi
S06adsp55-u:1170: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitukāmena bodhimaṇḍaniṣīditukāmena dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmena (AdSPG I 126)
S06adsp55-u:1172: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadasi?
S06adsp55-u:1174: prajñāpāramitayā subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi. sarvadharmavaśitābhāvanām anuprāptukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1175: eṣā hi prajñāpāramitā. yayā sarvadharmavaśitābhūmir anuprāpyate. eṣā hi prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ mukhaṃ. tadyathāpati nāma mahāsamudraḥ sarvanadīnāṃ mukham,
S06adsp55-u:1176_0: evam eva prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ mukhaṃ. śrāvākayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair
S06adsp55-u:1176_1: vā bodhisattvayānikair vā pudgalair ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. tasmāt
S06adsp55-u:1176_2: tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. śilapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1176_4: śikṣitavyaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte iṣvastrācāryo
S06adsp55-u:1176_5: yathānurūpaṃ dhanur gṛhītvā durādharṣo bhavati pratyarthikair vā pratyamitrair vā.
S06adsp55-u:1176_6: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durādharṣo bhavati
S06adsp55-u:1176_7: māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhiḥ. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06adsp55-u:1176_8: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. taṃ
S06adsp55-u:1176_9: ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantam atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāharanti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1178: tas taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti?
S06adsp55-u:1179: kathaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti?
S06adsp55-u:1180: katham adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti?
S06adsp55-u:1183_0: iha subhūte atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1183_1: carantaṃ samanvāharanti. śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1183_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti. tathā punaḥ samanvāharanti yathā naiva
S06adsp55-u:1183_3: dānaṃ na śīlaṃ na kṣāntiṃ na vīryaṃ na dhyānaṃ na prajñām upalabhate. evam anupalabhamānaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1183_4: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti. evaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1183_5: carantaṃ samanvāharanti. tathā ca punaḥ samanvāharanti,
S06adsp55-u:1184_0: yathā naiva sarvākārajñatām upalabhate. evam anupalabhamānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1184_1: samanvāharanti. punar aparaṃ subhūte buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ na
S06adsp55-u:1184_2: rūpataḥ samanvāharanti. na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārato na vijñanataḥ samanvāharanti.
S06adsp55-u:1185: bahuṣu bhagavaṃs sthāneṣu bodhisattyena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1188: evam etat subhūte evam etad. bahuṣu sthāneṣu bodhisattvena manāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ. na kvacic chikṣitavyaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1191: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgateneme dharmā saṃkṣipteṇa ca vistareṇa ca bhāṣitās, (AdSPG I 128)
S06adsp55-u:1192_0: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmenemāḥ
S06adsp55-u:1192_1: ṣaṭpāramitāḥ saṃkṣiptena ca vistareṇa ca paryavāptavyā paryavāpya vācā suparicitāḥ
S06adsp55-u:1193: tathā ca anuprekṣitavyā yathā cittacaitasikadharmā na pravarteran. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1194: evam etat subhūte evam etat. āsu saṃkṣiptavistareṇa ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo [f. 247b] mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃś ca saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1195: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati?
S06adsp55-u:1197: rūpasya vā vedanāyā vā saṃjñāyā vā saṃskarāṇāṃ vā vijñānasya vā tathatāṃ jānānaḥ. yāvat sarvākārajñatāyās tathatāṃ jānānaḥ. sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1200: yasyā tathatāyā notpādaḥ prajñāyate na vyayaḥ prajñāyate na sthitasyānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. iyaṃ rūpatathatā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1201: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ vedanāyā saṃjñāyā saṃskarāṇāṃ vijñānasya tathatā yāvat sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā?
S06adsp55-u:1203_0: yasyā tathatāyā notpāda prajñāyate na vyayaḥ prajñāyate na sthitasyānyathātvan prajñāyate
S06adsp55-u:1203_1: iyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānatathatā yāvat sarvākārajñatātathatā. yatra bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1203_2: mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ. bhūtakoṭiṃ jānānaḥ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1207: śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:1208: dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1212: yasya dharmadhātor nocchedaḥ prajñāyate na paricchedaḥ. evaṃ caraṃ dharmadhātuṃ jānānan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1215: yathā sarvadharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1216: katame te bhagavaṃ sarvadharmā ye na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1218: rūpaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ yāvat saṃskṛtadhātur asaṃskṛtadhātur na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1219: na hy asya svabhāvo 'sti yaḥ saṃyujyeta vā visaṃyujyeta vā,
S06adsp55-u:1221_0: yaś ca abhāvaḥ sa abhāvena sārddhaṃ na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. evaṃ sarvadharmā
S06adsp55-u:1221_1: jñātavyāḥ. ayaṃ punaḥ suhhūte abhisaṃkṣepo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ. atra hi
S06adsp55-u:1222: yāvad daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthitvā ihaiva abhisaṃkṣepe śikṣitavyaṃ. iha punar abhisaṃkṣepe śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣepavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1223: tīkṣṇendriyasya bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1225: mṛdvendriyasya api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśo,
S06adsp55-u:1227_0: api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ asamāhitendriyasya api bodhisattvasya
S06adsp55-u:1227_1: mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ. na ayaṃ kasyacid yan na praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06adsp55-u:1228: na kusīdasya ayaṃ praveśo na hīnavīryasya na muṣitasmṛter na vikṣiptacittasya,
S06adsp55-u:1230_0: śikṣitukāmasya avaivartikabhūmau sarvākārajñatām anuprāptukāmasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1230_1: saced yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate śikṣitvā dānāpāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1230_3: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1231_0: sa utpadyamānāny eva prahāsyante. tasmād upāyakauśalaṃ parigṛhītukāmena bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1231_1: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S06adsp55-u:1231_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:1231_3: tasmiṃ samaye asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti
S06adsp55-u:1231_4: saddharmaṃ deśayaṃti. te taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1232_0: ato niryātā hy atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavaṃta. yaduta ṣaṭpāramitebhyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1232_1: tasmāt tarhi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratikāṃkṣitavyam
S06adsp55-u:1232_2: aham apy etān dharmān anuprāpsyāmi. ye 'tītānāgatapratyutpannair buddhair bhagavadbhir
S06adsp55-u:1232_3: anuprāptā anuprāpyante. anuprāpsyante ca. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena (AdSPG I 131)
S06adsp55-u:1233_0: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata yogaṃ āpattavyaṃ. evaṃ yujyamāno bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1233_1: mahāsattva kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. tasmāt tarhi bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1233_2: mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāmanasikārair avirahitena bhavitavyaṃ. sacet punar bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1233_3: mahāsattva evaṃ caran sarvākārajñatāyām antaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātram api prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1233_4: bhāvayiṣyati. sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:1233_5: na tv eva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye sattvās tān dānena saṃtarpayet śīle
S06adsp55-u:1233_6: pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau pratiṣṭhāpayet prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktau pratiṣṭhāpayed
S06adsp55-u:1233_7: vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet śrotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed yāvad arhattve
S06adsp55-u:1234: ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām acchaṭāsaṃghātamātram api bhāvayet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1235_1: yāvad arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ. ye 'pi te buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06adsp55-u:1235_2: tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti te 'py ato niryātāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1235_3: ye 'pi te 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas te 'py ata eva prabhāvitā. prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1235_4: punar aparaṃ subhūte yo muhūrtaṃ vā divasaṃ vā divasaśataṃ vā saṃvatsaraṃ va saṃvatsaraśataṃ
S06adsp55-u:1235_5: vā. kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā yāvad asaṃkhyeyāny api kalpaśatāni imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1235_6: sarvākārajñatāraṃbaṇamanasikārair bhāvayiṣyati. sa prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:1235_7: na tv eva ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān sarvān dānena saṃtarpayet
S06adsp55-u:1235_8: śīle pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet
S06adsp55-u:1235_9: srotaāpattiphale yāvad arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet pratyekabodhau (AdSPG I 132)
S06adsp55-u:1237: ato niryātā [f. 248b] hi te buddhā bhagavanto yair etad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu prajñāptaṃ yāvad arhattvaṃ prajñaptaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ prajñaptā. yaḥ punar bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1238_0: mahāsattvaḥ evam upadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñapāramitāyāṃ sthāsyati. sa khalu punar bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1238_1: mahāsattvaḥ avaivartika pratikāṇkṣitavyaḥ. tathāgatasamanvāgata sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1238_3: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ sa bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1241: caturdaśaśūnyatābhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ yāvat catuḥpratisaṃvidabhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1245: buddhadarśana avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1246: kuśalamūla avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. buddhakṣetra avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1252: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ akṣarapraveśakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1253: anakṣarapraveśakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ bodhisattvavihārakusalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1256: nekādhivacanakuśalo dvyadhivacanakuśalo bahvādhivacanakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1257: stryadhivacanukuśalo puruṣādhivacanakuśalo napuṃsakādhivacanakuśalo sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1259: rūpakuśalo vedanākuśalaḥ saṃjñākuśalaḥ saṃskārakuśalaḥ vijñānakuśalaḥ yāvat nirvāṇakuśalo dharmadhātulakṣaṇakuśalaḥ saṃskṛtalaksaṇakuśalaḥ asaṃskṛtalakṣaṇakuśalaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1263_1: dhātukuśalaḥ adhātukuśalaḥ rūpamanasikārakuśalaḥ yāvat vijñānamanasikārakuśalaḥ yāvat
S06adsp55-u:1263_2: sarvākārajñatāmanasikārakuśalaḥ rūpaṃ rūpeṇa sūnyam iti kuśalaḥ yāvat vijñānaṃ vijñānena
S06adsp55-u:1263_3: śūnyam iti kuśalaḥ yāvad bodhi bodhyā śūnyeti kuśalaḥ praśrabdhimārgakuśalaḥ apraśrabdhimārgakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1263_5: arāgakuśalaḥ adveṣakuśalaḥ amohakuśalaḥ dṛṣṭikuśalaḥ adṛṣṭikuśalaḥ mithyādṛṣṭikuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1263_6: amithyādṛṣṭikuśalaḥ yāvat sarvadṛṣṭikuśalaḥ nāmakuśalo nāmarūpakuśalaḥ āraṃbaṇakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1263_7: adhipatikuśalaḥ ākārakuśalaḥ lakṣaṇakuśalaḥ duḥkhakuśalaḥ samudayakuśalaḥ nirodhakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1263_8: mārgakuśalaḥ narakakuśalaḥ tiryagyonikuśalo yamalokakuśalaḥ manuṣyakuśalaḥ manuṣyamārgakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1265_0: arthakuśalo vyañjanakuśalaḥ yānatrayāvasthānakusalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1265_1: ete 'nuśāṃsāḥ subhūte tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ
S06adsp55-u:1265_2: prajñāpāramitām abhinirharataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1266: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā?
S06adsp55-u:1268_0: rūpaśāntatayā rūpavaśikatayā rūpatucchakatayā rūpāsārakatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:1268_2: asārakatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. yat punar subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
S06adsp55-u:1270: ākāśaśūnyatābhinirhareṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. yat punar evaṃ vadasi,
S06adsp55-u:1273: kiyac ciraṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cīrṇāṃ bhavati?
S06adsp55-u:1275: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. evam abhinirhartavyā bhāvayitavyā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1278: anyeṣāṃ manasikārāṇām avakāśam adadatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1279_1: abhinirhartavyā prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā. tathā punaś caritavyaṃ tathā bhāvayitavyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1279_2: tathā abhinirhartavyā yathā cittacaitasikā dharmā na pravartante. āha;
S06adsp55-u:1280: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitām abhinirharatā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā sarvākārajñatā anuprāpyate?
S06adsp55-u:1282: no hi iti. āha: tat kim (AdSPG I 136)
S06adsp55-u:1286: tat kiṃ bhāvayatā ca abhāvayatā ca?
S06adsp55-u:1289: tat kiṃ naiva bhāvayatā nā bhāvayatā?
S06adsp55-u:1303: yathā ātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātuḥ pudgaladhātuḥ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1304: kathaṃ bhagavann ātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātuḥ pudgaladhātu?
S06adsp55-u:1306: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā pudgalo vā upalabhyate?
S06adsp55-u:1307: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1308: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte ātmānaṃ vā sattvaṃ vā jivaṃ vā pudgalaṃ vā,
S06adsp55-u:1309: katham ātmadhātuṃ sattvadhātum jīvadhātuṃ pudgaladhātuṃ prajñapayiṣyāmaḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1310: evam aprajñapayan prajñāpāramitām evaṃ aprajñapayaṃ sarvadharmān sarvākārajñātam anuprāpsyati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1311_0: kiṃ punar bhagavann aprajñapanīyā prajñāpāramitā. aprajñapanīyā dhyānapāramitā aprajñapanīyā
S06adsp55-u:1311_1: vīryapāramitā aprajñapanīyā kṣāntipāramitā aprajñapanīyā śīlapāramitā aprajñapanīyā dānapāramitā?
S06adsp55-u:1313: aprajñapanīyā subhūte prajñāpāramitā aprajñapanīyā yāvat sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1314_0: yadi bhagavann aprajñapanīyā sarvadharmā kutaḥ punar bhagavan narakāḥ prajñāyante.
S06adsp55-u:1314_1: tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā prajñāyate. devā vā manuṣyā vā prajñāyante śrotaāpanno
S06adsp55-u:1314_2: vā sakṛdāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā arhan vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā (AdSPG I 137)
S06adsp55-u:1317: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sattvaprajñaptir upalabhyate?
S06adsp55-u:1318: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1319_0: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte sattvān kuto narakaṃ prajñapayiṣyāmi. tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1319_1: vā devān vā manuṣyan vā śrotaāpannaṃ vā sakṛdāgāminaṃ vā anāgāminaṃ vā arhattvaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1319_2: vā pratyekabuddhaṃ vā samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ vā prajñapayiṣyāmi?
S06adsp55-u:1320: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā aprajñapanīyeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1321_0: na punar bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpe śikṣitavyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1321_1: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ [f. 250a] yāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne śikṣitavyaṃ yāvan na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1322: rūpe śikṣitavyaṃ anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā. vedanāyāṃ saṃjnāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā. yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1323: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ rūpe śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā. kathaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu kathaṃ vijñāne śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā?
S06adsp55-u:1326: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā?
S06adsp55-u:1332: saṃskārāṇāṃ na bhāvanāyāṃ na vibhāvanāyāṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1339_0: rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ. vedanā vedanayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā. saṃjñā saṃjñayā
S06adsp55-u:1339_1: śūnyā draṣṭavyā saṃskārā saṃskarai śūnyā draṣṭavyā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1339_2: cakṣuś caksūṣā śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ. yāvat mano manasā śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyam adhyātmaśūnyatā
S06adsp55-u:1339_3: adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā yāvat svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatayā śūnyā
S06adsp55-u:1339_4: draṣṭavyā dhyānāni dhyānai śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni. yāvan nirodhasamāpattir nirodhasamāpattyā
S06adsp55-u:1339_5: śūnyā draṣṭavyā smṛtyūpasthānāni smṛtyupasthānai śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni yāvad bodhir
S06adsp55-u:1339_6: bodhyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1340: yadi bhagavaṃ rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ yāvad bodhir bodhyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataś caryā bhavati?
S06adsp55-u:1342: acaryā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1345_0: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate bodhisattvo 'pi nopalabhyate. caryā
S06adsp55-u:1345_1: api nopalabhyate. yaś carati yena vā carati yatra vā carati tad api nopalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:1345_2: iyaṃ subhūte acaryā bodhisattvasya māhasattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā yatraite sarvaprapaṃcā nopalabhyante. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1346: yadi bhagavann acaryā prajñāpāramitācaryā tat katham ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:1348: iha subhūte ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam evārabhya anupalaṃbheṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ. tena dānaṃ dadatā anupalaṃbhayogena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1350_0: rakṣitavyaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpādayatā anupalaṃbhayogena kṣāntyā saṃpādayitavyaṃ. vīryam
S06adsp55-u:1350_1: ārabhamāṇena anupalaṃbhayogena vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ. samādhiṃ samāpadyamānena anupalaṃbhayogena
S06adsp55-u:1350_2: samādhiḥ samāpattavyaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayatā. anupalaṃbhayogena [f. 250b] prajñā bhāvayitavyā.
S06adsp55-u:1350_3: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayatā anupalaṃbhayogena sarvākārajñatā bhāvayitavyā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1351: kiyatā bhagavann anupalaṃbho bhavati. kiyatopalaṃbho bhavati?
S06adsp55-u:1353: yāvad dvayaṃ tāvad upalaṃbha. advayam anupalaṃbha. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1356: yāvat cakṣūrūpāṇi yāvad yāvan manodharmāś ca yāvad yāvad bodhir buddhāś ca idaṃ subhūte dvayaṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1357: kiṃ punar bhagavann upalabhyo 'nupalaṃbhaḥ atha anupalabhyo 'nupalaṃbha?
S06adsp55-u:1359_0: na subhūte anupalaṃbhyo 'nupalaṃbha. na anupalabhyo 'nupalaṃbhaḥ. api tu khalu punaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1359_1: subhūte upalaṃbha anupalaṃbhasamatā anupalaṃbhaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1359_2: mahāsattvena upalaṃbhasamatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S06adsp55-u:1360: yadi bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naivopalaṃbhe sajjate naivānupalaṃbhe,
S06adsp55-u:1361: kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiḥ paripūrayitavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1364_0: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upalaṃbhe sthitvā bhūmer
S06adsp55-u:1364_1: bhūmiṃ paripūrayati. na hy upalaṃbhe sthitvā śakyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajnāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1364_2: caratā bhūmer bhūmi paripūrayituṃ. tat kasya heto?
S06adsp55-u:1365: anupalaṃbho hi prajñāpāramitā anupalaṃbho bodhi so 'pi nopalabhyate. yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG I 140)
S06adsp55-u:1367_0: yadi bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate bodhir api nopalabhyate yo 'pi bodhau carati
S06adsp55-u:1367_1: so 'pi nopalabhyate. tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1367_2: caratā sarvadharmeṣu pravicayaḥ kartavyaḥ idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ vedanā iyaṃ saṃjñā ime
S06adsp55-u:1367_3: saṃskārā idaṃ vijñānaṃ yāvad iyaṃ bodhiḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1369_0: na hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tathā dharmeṣu pravicayaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1369_1: karoti. yathā kurvan rūpam upalabheta vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam upalabheta.
S06adsp55-u:1370: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ nopalabhate. vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nopalabhate. yāvad bodhiṃ nopalabhate,
S06adsp55-u:1371_0: katham idānīṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrya śīlapāramitāṃ kṣantipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1371_1: dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrya bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati. bodhisattvanyāmam
S06adsp55-u:1371_2: avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati. buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sattvān paripācayati.
S06adsp55-u:1371_3: sattvān paripācya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ
S06adsp55-u:1371_4: pravartayati. dharmacakraṃ pravartya buddhakāryaṃ karoti. buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā sattvān
S06adsp55-u:1373_0: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpasya kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. na vedanāyā
S06adsp55-u:1373_1: na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ na vijñānasya kṛte yāvan na bodheḥ [f. 25la] kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1374: kasya bhagavan kṛte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ (AdSPG I 141)
S06adsp55-u:1378: kṛte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:1379: tathā hy akṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1381: bodhir apy akṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā. bodhisattvo 'py akṛto 'nabhisaṃskṛtaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam akṛta anabhisaṃskṛtayogena. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1383: tat katham eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati. śrāvākayānasya vā pratyekabuddhayānasya vā mahāyānasya vā?
S06adsp55-u:1385: na subhūte akṛtānabhisaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kiṃcid vyavasthānam upalabhyate. abhisaṃskṛtānām abhisaṃcetayitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānam upalabhyate. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:1386_0: tathā hi bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjano 'bhiniviśya pañcasu skandheṣu rūpe yāvad vijñāne.
S06adsp55-u:1386_1: yāvat sarvākārajñātāyām abhiniviśya rūpaṃ manyate rūpam upalabhate. yāvad vijñānaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1386_2: manyate vijñānam upalabhate. yāvad bodhiṃ manyate bodhim upalabhate. tasyaivaṃ bhavaty:
S06adsp55-u:1387: ahaṃ bodhim abhisaṃbhotsye ahaṃ sattvān mocayiṣye saṃsārāt sa evam asat kalpayati. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:1388: tathā hi subhūte yad buddhaiḥ paṃcabhiś cakṣubhir nopalabdhaṃ rūpaṃ yāvad bodhiḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1389: tat te mohapuruṣā andhā acakṣuṣkā sattvāṃc chinnanti saṃsārāt parimocayituṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1390: yadi bhagavaṃs tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena paṃcabhiś cakṣubhir nopalabhdāḥ sattvā ye saṃsārāt parimucyeran,
S06adsp55-u:1391: katham idānīṃ bhagavān anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvāṃs tṛṣu rāśiṣu vyākarṣīt,
S06adsp55-u:1394: na me subhūte anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya kaścit sattva upalabdhaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1395: samyaktvaniyato vā aniyato vā mithyātvaniyato vā. api tu khalu subhūte ya ime sattvā adravye dravyasaṃjñina. abhūtagrāhād vārayāmi,
S06adsp55-u:1397: nanu bhagavatā paramārthe sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā?
S06adsp55-u:1400: tad viparyāse sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā?
S06adsp55-u:1403_0: tad yadi bhagavan nāpi paramārthe sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā
S06adsp55-u:1403_1: nāpi viparyāse sthitvā tan mā haiva na tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā
S06adsp55-u:1404: abhisaṃbuddhā subhūte tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1405_0: sā na kvacit sthitvā saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte
S06adsp55-u:1405_1: tathāgatanirmito na kvacit sthitaḥ saṃskṛte vā dhātau vā asaṃskṛte vā dhātau. sa
S06adsp55-u:1407: sa dānapāramitāyāṃ carec chīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caret,
S06adsp55-u:1408_0: yāvac catvāri dhyānāny upasaṃpadya viharet catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattī.
S06adsp55-u:1408_1: pañcābhijñā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayed yāvad āryāṣṭāṃgaṃ [f. 251b] mārgaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1408_2: śūnyatāṃ samādhim ānimittaṃ samādhim apraṇihitaṃ samādhim adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvat
S06adsp55-u:1408_3: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvasamāpattīr daśatathāgatabalāni catvān
S06adsp55-u:1408_4: vaiśāradyāni catasra pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇām (AdSPG I 143)
S06adsp55-u:1409: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān dharmacakrapravartanāyai. sa ca nirmitaḥ apy apramāṇān sattvān nirmāya triṣu rāśiṣu vyākuryāt,
S06adsp55-u:1410: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte. api nu tena nirmitena kaścit sattvo vyākṛto bhavet?
S06adsp55-u:1411: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1412_0: evam eva subhūte tathāgatena nirmitopamā sarvadharmā jñātā gaṇitā ajñānanirmitāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1412_1: jñātvā na kaścit sattva upalabdho nāpi vinītaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1412_2: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmita. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1414: tathāgatasya ca nirmitasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ ko 'bhiprāyaḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1416: tathāgatasya subhūte nirmitasya ca na kiṃcid viśeṣo na kiṃcin nānākaraṇam upalabhyate. nirviśeṣo hi subhūte tathāgataś ca nirmitaś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1417: tathā hi yat tathāgataḥ karma karoti. taṃ nirmitaḥ karma karoti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1418: kiṃ punar bhagavan sati tathāgate nirmitaḥ karma karoti?
S06adsp55-u:1421: atha kathaṃ punar bhagavann asati tathāgate nirmita karma karoti?
S06adsp55-u:1423: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte śāntamatis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvam anupalabhamānas tathāgatavigrahaṃ nirmāya parinirvṛta,
S06adsp55-u:1424: tena ca nirmitenordhvaṃ kalpaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1425: sa ca paścād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ vyākṛtya parinirvṛta iti saṃjñātaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1426_0: na ca nirmitasya kaścid utpādo na parinirvāṇaṃ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1426_1: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ yaduta nirmitopamān sarvadharmān adhimucya.
S06adsp55-u:1427: nirmitasya ca tathāgatasya ca viśeṣo nāsti,
S06adsp55-u:1428_0: dakṣiṇāpariśuddhiḥ kathaṃ bhaviṣyati. ya ime bhagavaṃ sattvā puṇyārthikā nirvānārthikās
S06adsp55-u:1428_1: tathāgate 'rhe samyaksaṃbuddhe dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti. na ca jātu sā kṣīyate yāvan
S06adsp55-u:1428_2: na te sarve 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhavanti. evam eva nirmite dakṣiṇā
S06adsp55-u:1428_3: pratiṣṭhāpitā. na jātu kṣīyate yāvan na te sarve 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhavanti?
S06adsp55-u:1430_0: yayā subhūte dharmatayā tathāgata sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyaḥ tathaiva
S06adsp55-u:1430_1: dharmatayā nirmitaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyaḥ. tiṣṭhatu tāvat subhūte
S06adsp55-u:1430_2: tathāgatapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā. tiṣṭhatu tathāgatanirmitapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā. ye
S06adsp55-u:1430_3: 'pi kecit subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tathā tathāgataṃ maitrāvatā manasikāreṇa manasikariṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:1431: sarve te tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti. tiṣṭhatu maitrāvān manasikāraḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1432: ye pi kecit subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ākāśe puṣpaṃ kṣepsyanti tathāgataṃ manasikṛtya,
S06adsp55-u:1433: sarve te tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam anadhigamya,
S06adsp55-u:1434: duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti. tiṣṭhatu subhūte maitrāvān manasikāraḥ tiṣṭhatv ākāśe puṣpaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1435: ye kecit subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā buddhaṃ namaskariṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:1436: sarve te [f. 252a] 'nupūrveṇa duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti. evaṃ mahārthikā vata subhūte tathāgatapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā. evaṃ mahānuśaṃsā. tad anena paryāyeṇa subhūte veditavyaṃ. ,
S06adsp55-u:1437: tathāgatasya ca nirmitasya ca nāsti kiṃcin nānākaraṇaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1439: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1440: dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāyām avatīrya. sā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na vikopayitavyā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyaṃ. iyan dhyāna pāramitā,
S06adsp55-u:1441: iyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyaṃ. yāvat iyan dānapāramitā iyan dānapāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyaṃ. evaṃ yāvat sarvadharmeṣu kartavyaṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1442: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na vikopayitavyā,
S06adsp55-u:1443: tad yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena vikopitam idaṃ rūpam yāvad idaṃ vijñānaṃ. evam adhyātmikā bāhyā dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1444: evaṃ kuśalā akuśalāḥ sāsravā anāsravāḥ laukikā lokottarāḥ sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇāḥ saṃskṛta asaṃskṛtā dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1445: tan mā haiva bhagavatā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā vikopitā bhavati?
S06adsp55-u:1447: no hīdaṃ subhūte. nāmanimittaiś ca mayā te dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ dharmāṇāṃ sūcanā kṛtā,
S06adsp55-u:1448: kathaṃ paro 'vataret iti. na punar dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā vikopitā bhavati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1449: yadi bhagavaṃ nāmani mittaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ pareṣām avataraṇārthaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1450: tat kathaṃ bhagavann anāmakā animittā dharmā nāmanimittena vyāhṛtāḥ bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1451: vyāhāraḥ subhūte na nāmanimittaṃ na abhiniveśo vā,
S06adsp55-u:1452: nānyatra subhūte duḥkham eva vyāharāmi na nāmni na nimitte vā abhiniveśe. na hi subhūte tathāgato vā tathāgataśrāvako vā nāmanimitte (AdSPG I 146)
S06adsp55-u:1460_0: asaṃskṛtam asaṃskṛte 'bhiniviśeta. abhiniviśeta tathāgato vā tathāgataśrāvako vā
S06adsp55-u:1460_1: nāmanimitte. ete ca sarvadharmā nāmamātraṃ. na caite nāmamātre 'py avatiṣṭhante.
S06adsp55-u:1460_2: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmanimittamātre sthitvā prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06adsp55-u:1460_3: caritavyaṃ. tatra ca na abhiniveṣṭavyaṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1461: yadi bhagavaṃ nāmanimittamātram eva sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1462: tat kasyedānīṃ kṛte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye cittam
S06adsp55-u:1464_0: bodhaye cittaṃ utpādya anekavidhān saṃskārāviprakārān pratyanubhavati. bodhisattvacārikāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1464_1: carati. bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran vicitrāṇi dānāni dadāti. śīlañ ca rakṣati kṣāntyā

S06adsp55-u:2059: evam etat subhūte evam etat. na abhāvasaṃjñina ānulomikī kṣāntir asti yāvan nāsti sarvavāsanānusandhikleśaprahānaṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:2060: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhāvasaṃjñā bhavaty abhāvasaṃjñā vā,
S06adsp55-u:2085_0: no hīdaṃ subhūte. na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kvacid
S06adsp55-u:2085_1: dharme bhāvasaṃjñī vā abhāvasaṃjñī vā bhavati. eṣaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06adsp55-u:2085_2: ānulomikī kṣāntir yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā na abhāvasaṃjñā. eṣaivāsya mārgabhāvanā
S06adsp55-u:2085_3: yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā na abhāvasaṃjñā. etad eva asya phalaṃ yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā
S06adsp55-u:2085_4: na abhāvasaṃjñā. abhāvaḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:2086: abhāva eva abhisamayas. tad anena api te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam:
S06adsp55-u:2089: tat kathaṃ bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tathāgatena abhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:2091: anuprāptā? evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:2092: iha ahaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caraṃ,
S06adsp55-u:2094_0: viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalaiḥ dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ
S06adsp55-u:2094_1: prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvad caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharāmi. so 'haṃ
S06adsp55-u:2094_2: teṣān dhyānānāṃ dhyānāṅgānāñ ca nimittam anudgṛhṇaṃs,
S06adsp55-u:2097: dhyānāni nopalabhe. so 'haṃ tāni dhyānāny ākāraviśuddhāni samāpadye,
S06adsp55-u:2098: so 'haṃ tāni dhyānāni vipākīkṛtvā vividhajñānasākṣātkriyāyai cittam abhinirṇāmayāmi,
S06adsp55-u:2099_1: divyacakṣurjñānasākṣātkriyāyai cittam abhinirṇāmayāmi. tāsāṃ sākṣātkriyāyāṃ nimittam
S06adsp55-u:2099_2: anudgṛhṇaṃs tābhir abhijñabhir na manye na āsvādayāmi nopalabhe. so 'haṃ tāḥ pañcābhijñāḥ
S06adsp55-u:2099_3: ākāśasamāḥ paśyāmi samāpadye. so 'haṃ subhūte ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā anuttarāṃ
S06adsp55-u:2103_0: so 'haṃ daśabhiḥ tathāgatabalaiḥ samanvāgataś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ
S06adsp55-u:2103_1: mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā 'ṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sattvāṃs
S06adsp55-u:2104: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs [f. 265a] tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena abhāvasvabhāvāni catvāri dhyānāni utpāditāni,
S06adsp55-u:2108: sacet subhūte kāmānāṃ vā pāpakānāṃ vā akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo 'bhaviṣyad bhāvo vābhaviṣyat para bhāvo vābhaviṣyan,
S06adsp55-u:2109_0: na ahaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvān kāmān viditvā abhāvasvabhāvān
S06adsp55-u:2109_1: pāpakān akuśalān dharmān viditvā catvāri dhyānāny upasaṃpadya vyāharṣaṃ. yasmāt tarhi
S06adsp55-u:2109_2: subhūte na kāmānāṃ pāpakānāṃ ca akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo 'sti na bhāvo na parabhāvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:2110_0: tasmād ahaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair
S06adsp55-u:2110_1: dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānam upasaṃpadya vyāharṣaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:2110_2: evaṃ yāvat caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyāharṣaṃ. sacet subhūte abhijñānāṃ bhāvo
S06adsp55-u:2110_3: vā svabhāvo vā parabhāvo vā abhaviṣyan,
S06adsp55-u:2111: na ahaṃ subhūte sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye. yasmāt tarhi subhūte sarvābhijñānāṃ na bhāvo na svabhāvo na parabhāvo 'sti,
S06adsp55-u:2113: tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ.
